Entries.summer_Fri10: {{Random: Thank you for spending time with me, @. I was hoping you would come by today.$1#$b#It's nice to take a break from my experiments and talk with you. How is your farm?$1#$e#It is my hope you are successful in all your doings.$9 @@ Any plans for the weekend?$1#$b#I would be honored if you'd like to spend part of it with me.$4 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.summer_Sat10: One can get so caught up in work that life just falls away. Others retreat to their work because they cannot handle their life.#$b#I'm realizing lately that I've done a lot of things that I wasn't happy with. Forced myself to do what was wrong for what I thought was right.$2#$b#I hope to someday get forgiveness, @.$0#$e#Someday.$1
Entries.summer_Sun10: {{Random: There is a special energy in the air today. I can feel it, can you?$7#$b#It is our energy! It is invigorating. It makes me feel young again.$6#$e#Is that weird? I don't get out much, @.$9 @@ We should take a trip together into the forest soon, @...$3#$b#There are all kinds of secret places I'd like to show you.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.fall_1: Can you feel the changes in the air? I don't just mean in the temperature. The trees, they are giving off a unique energy.#$e#May this fall be an enchanted one.$1
Entries.fall_Mon: They who live in the shadows are lost, for their world has moved beyond them. Pity those who have consumed the dark pastry.$2#$e#Have a day to remember, @.$1
Entries.fall_Tue: The creatures who slide on the earth, what is their purpose? Where do they come from?$3#$b#They are known across the ages and cultures but a source for their being has never been found.$1#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.$1
Entries.fall_Wed: Have you seen them? The golems that search for their long-dead creators.#$b#They will wander the mines forever, alone, until they run out of energy.#$e#Have a good day, @. Learn something new.$1
Entries.fall_Thu: Normal creature or monster? It's hard to tell of the bats that fly in the caves.$3#$b#Their energy fluctuates with the moon, and they crave the lifeblood of any they can. Beware their haunting gaze.$0#$e#Seek the energies, @. Enjoy the day.$1
Entries.fall_Fri: There are creatures who have adapted to look like stone itself in the mines. It it is not through magical means that they did so, rather through sheer will-power.#$b#Sometimes the only energy you need comes from within.$1#$e#Focus your mind today, @, and be at peace.$1
Entries.fall_Sat: There are spirits, deep in the mines, who have wandered for eternity. Some of the first souls are still trapped in there.#$b#They don't even resemble humans anymore, so twisted has their ethereal image become. Such a tragedy.$2#$e#Seek knowledge, seek answers. Have a good one.$1
Entries.fall_Sun: The mines were once a vast world that was compacted as a result of an ancient war.#$b#Going through the layers is to pass through time itself. Be wary, for it is an unforgiving place.#$b#Those creatures have lost more than their minds.$2#$e#Be enchanted, @. Be at peace.$1
Entries.fall_Mon2: This season is special, for the power to be able to change is heightened. Be it your life, your thinking, or your surroundings, the powers of fall make it possible.$1#$b#Choose wisely, however, for not all change is positive.$0#$e#Have a day to remember, @.$1
Entries.fall_Tue2: Focus on what matters, and all should work out, unless it doesn't. There are no guarantees in life.#$b#In my studies, I have found this to be true, and it is unfortunate. Nothing is guaranteed to always work.#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.$1
Entries.fall_Wed2: As the trees enter their slumber, they let loose their leaves and their energy. It is this energy that is useful to me.$3#$b#Once winter comes, all the energies wane. Fall is the finale.$0#$e#Have a good day, @. Learn something new.$1
Entries.fall_Thu2: When all seems lost, it is important to remember that things can still change. For better, or for worse.#$b#It is important not to give up, and to see it through to the end. Easier said than done, sometimes, but I've found it to be true.$1#$e#Seek the energies, @. Enjoy the day.$1
Entries.fall_Fri2: I once saw a person try to keep a tree alive all year long, using powerful energies to do so.#$b#It was horrible: the tree itself wept, and begged to be freed. I had to step in and save the tree.$2#$b#I still have some of its leaves it gave to me as a gift. They are special to me.$2#$e#Focus your mind today, @, and be at peace.$1
Entries.fall_Sat2: My powers have begun to lose their potency, as it always is in fall. I would take from the trees, but I refuse to do so.#$b#I plan on reading a lot this season. Who knows what I'll find?$3#$e#Seek knowledge, seek answers. Have a good one.$1
Entries.fall_Sun2: You must be having some success on your farm to make it this far, @. How fare your crops?$3#$b#It is refreshing to see someone push through the difficulty and keep going. Your rewards are ahead of you.$1#$e#Be enchanted, @. Be at peace.$1
Entries.fall_Mon4: {{Random: Long ago, the Shrine of Illusion was in the hands of a group of assassins. They used its powers to change their appearance and make hits.#$b#A very long time ago, indeed.$3#$e#Have a day to remember, @.$1 @@ I wish I could go into town to get seeds for my garden, but going into Pierre's store is a little awkward for me.$0#$e#And that Joja monstrosity isn't even worth mentioning.$3#$e#Have a day to remember, @.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.fall_Tue4: The assassins who used the Shrine of Illusion were almost unstoppable in their time. It took a group of people like myself to stop them.#$b#It was a troubling time. An artifact like that should never be used for such gains.$5#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.$0
Entries.fall_Wed4: {{Random: With the Shrine of Illusion gone from the ranks of the assassins, their order crumbled. Many searched for it, to reclaim their honor, but alas.#$b#Such is the way of those who used it for evil. It never worked out for them.#$e#Have a good day, @. Learn something new.$1 @@ How goes your interactions with the Junimos, @?$0#$e#I've encountered a few now. They're certainly a strange sort.$3#$e#Have a good day, @. Learn something new.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.fall_Thu4: {{Random: The Shrine of Illusion was lost for a time, and there is no known record for where it went.#$b#Some like to believe it changed its own shape, and hid in the world somewhere, finding peace.$3#$e#Seek the energies, @. Enjoy the day.$1 @@ Today, I'm strengthening the wards that protect the valley. I'm happy to do the work of maintaining them.$0#$e#Seek the energies, @. Enjoy the day.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.fall_Fri4: I feel bad for the assassins who were stuck in the form they chose after losing access to the Shrine of Illusion.$3#$b#Their burden to bear, wearing a mask stitched onto their face forever. Chilling. Such is its power.$2#$e#Focus your mind today, @, and be at peace.$1
Entries.fall_Sat4: It is impossible to converse with the Shrine of Illusion, yet I feel a living presence within it. I know it can hear me, but yet it remains silent.$3#$b#It makes a poor companion. It really just wants gold, and to be left alone, so I do the best I can.$1#$e#Seek knowledge, seek answers. Have a good one.$1
Entries.fall_Sun4: {{Random: The Shrine of Illusion has amazing powers, and I am honored to have it here in my tower.$1#$b#I think it feels safe, but it's hard to know with such artifacts.$3#$b#I would like to see someone try and break in here for it, though.$1#$e#Be enchanted, @. Be at peace.$1 @@ Doing well today, @?$1#$e#Glad to hear it. I'm heading into the woods to forage for ingredients later.$9#$e#Be enchanted, @. Be at peace.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.fall_Mon6: Here is a warning, @. Be careful during fall, for it is a time of enchantment.#$b#The trees, as they go dormant, let loose their energies and their wishes. It can have some strange effects on people.#$e#Have a day to remember, @.$9
Entries.fall_Tue6: {{Random: If you find yourself obsessed with something you've never been interested before, it can mean you have been enchanted.$3#$b#Not all enchantments are bad, of course. Some can be quite positive. It is very mysterious.$1#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.$9 @@ Why do I choose to live out in the forest on my own?$3#$b#Largely because it's more convenient for my magic. It's in close proximity to the magical spots in the forest. Not to mention, my cauldron occasionally produces some very strange smells.$0#$b#I'd inevitably receive complaints.$9#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.fall_Wed6: My ex-wife was very strong during fall. Her energies were off the chart.#$b#I will admit, it made me jealous, and that didn't help things.$2#$b#Sometimes I wonder if it's her enchanting people during fall...$3#$e#Have a good day, @. Learn something new.$1
Entries.fall_Thu6: I need to focus on my experiments before the energies of fall are gone. Winter is a rough time.#$b#If I can make a breakthrough, I'll ride the excitement till spring.$7#$e#Seek the energies, @. Enjoy the day.$1
Entries.fall_Fri6: Many cultures around the world must be aware of the odd energies of fall. So many festivals about monsters are scattered throughout.$3#$b#It was my favorite time of year as a kid. Now, I must be on my guard.$0#$e#Focus your mind today, @, and be at peace.$1
Entries.fall_Sat6: {{Random: This is the time of harvest, so how has your farm been? Have you been able to get any special crops?$1#$b#It is my hope that you do. Only through the hands of hard work can the true energy be found.$9#$e#Seek knowledge, seek answers. Have a good one.$1 @@ Olivia certainly has some strange ideas about mysticism. I wonder what they teach her in those yoga classes.$0#$e#I may take her on for some tutelage to make sure she's on the right track...$3#$e#Seek knowledge, seek answers. Have a good one.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.fall_Sun6: The shadow brutes, have you seen them? Though many are monsters, there is one out there who isn't. Have you met him?#$b#I have known of it for a long time. I hope it remains friendly.$3#$e#Be enchanted, @. Be at peace.$1
Entries.fall_Mon8: {{Random: Enchantments, energies, and experiments. Though their powers are great and can do many things, they can't solve all of life's problems.#$b#They cannot, for example, make someone fall in love with another and have it be an honest relationship. It never ends well.$3#$e#Have a day to remember, @.$7 @@ Are you close to Abigail...?$3#$b#I wish I knew how to approach her to get to know her better.$0#$e#...We probably shouldn't discuss it, @. Sorry for bringing it up.$2#$e#Have a day to remember, @.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.fall_Tue8: When I was young, I found myself in a haunted house during a rainstorm and had to stay the night.$3#$b#I saw many things that night, but the one that sticks with me is the spirit of a child, wandering the halls all night long.$10#$b#It did not cry, it only looked for its parents. What's worse is, I thought I saw her parents fly around nearby her, but they couldn't see each other.$11#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.$3
Entries.fall_Wed8: {{Random: I do not want to become a ghost. It is my hope that when my time comes, I will be able to transcend to some higher plane.$3#$b#I would be a terrible ghost, as well. I do not enjoy scaring people.$7#$e#Have a good day, @. Learn something new.$1 @@ You know, I felt you were special from the first time we met.$0#$e#And I have to admit, I found it quite charming when you took that whiff from my cauldron and went so green I thought you were going to turn into a frog.$7#$e#Have a good day, @. Learn something new.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.fall_Thu8: One of the oddities about my studies are the rules of certain things. For example, I can conjure familiars, obelisks, and more.#$b#Yet, there are no powers at my disposal that can open a sealed jar of pickles or peanut butter. I have searched long and far, yet the rule remains.$3#$e#Seek the energies, @. Enjoy the day.$7
Entries.fall_Fri8: I will be honest with you, @, I did not expect to last this long, and sometimes I wonder what I've done right.#$b#Many people who lead this life give in to temptation, or go too far. It amazes me that I have not.#$e#Focus your mind today, @, and be at peace.$7
Entries.fall_Sat8: There is an odd feeling during this time of year for me. Things are at peace, and yet, I am worried.#$b#Maybe I'm just getting paranoid. I need to get out more.$11#$e#Seek knowledge, seek answers. Have a good one.$1
Entries.fall_Sun8: There is a part of me that wishes I could become enchanted, to live life free from knowing the secrets and be at peace. Yet, that would be impossible.#$b#I've studied too much, and learned things I cannot unlearn. It is a benefit, and yet also, a burden.$2#$e#Be enchanted, @. Be at peace.$1
Entries.fall_Mon10: Studying and using the energies can make one very tired, @. All these years of it has brought me to the brink.#$b#Yet it is my curiosity that drives me. I don't have all the answers, and there are still questions I have.$3#$b#Like you, @. What continues to bring you back to me, time and again?$1#$e#Perhaps someday I will understand you.$1#$b#Then again, I enjoy the mystery.$7
Entries.fall_Tue10: {{Random: There have been times when I have had the chance to wield unlimited energy. Many would be tempted by such power.#$b#I am only human. I was lucky to reject them, for it would have destroyed me.$3#$b#All that glimmers is not always good, @.$3#$e#Who knows what I would have become? A scary thought.$3 @@ You know, despite living outside the town, I do enjoy the company of the people in this valley.$1#$b#Yours most of all, of course.$6 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.fall_Wed10: Am I a better person than I was before all this? In all my searching, have I been able to find a way to become stronger?$3#$b#I have answers to many mysteries, but they haven't changed me. They are only answers. Have I done all I can?$3#$e#I have thought about these things for a long time. My own mystery.$0
Entries.fall_Thu10: {{Random: Words can't express how grateful I am for you, @. It is nice to be able to talk with someone about all the aspects of my work.$1#$e#...Amongst other things.$4 @@ Are you staying safe, @?$3#$b#I have to admit, I've grown a little protective of you. Perhaps I'll put together a charmed amulet of defense.$0#$e#It's up to you if you want to wear it, of course.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.fall_Fri10: {{Random: I have been focusing my energies lately to find the answer to this question: how is it that when I'm out and about I'm tired, but when I try to sleep, I cannot?$11#$b#It is a grand mystery, @. Someday I will solve it. First with sheep-counting.$10#$e#So many sheep...$11 @@ Any plans for the weekend?$1#$b#I would be honored if you'd like to spend part of it with me.$4 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.fall_Sat10: Your crops, how have they fared? It is my hope that they are doing well.$7#$b#You deserve greatness, @. It is my hope you find it, for I believe it is close at hand for you.$1#$e#If not, then, I have failed you.$10
Entries.fall_Sun10: {{Random: It is difficult to remember what it is to have normal conversations. When conversing with the energies, one must speak a unique and complex language.#$b#To talk human is to ask how another is, and to do that with meaning is hard for me. Luckily, I can practice on you.$1#$e#What's up, dog? No? Is that not a saying?$3 @@ We should take a trip together into the forest soon, @...$3#$b#There are all kinds of secret places I'd like to show you.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.winter_1: It is a time for peace and study. The snow fall has made me weak, and I will rest.#$e#I hope this is a special winter for you, @.$1
Entries.winter_Mon: The snow is beautiful, isn't it? It has special properties that give it an enchanting aura.$1#$b#I enjoy watching it. It is very calming.$1#$e#Have a day to remember, @.$9
Entries.winter_Tue: During winter, as my power is at its weakest, I enjoy reading books in my collection.#$b#I have so many interesting books, that I wonder if I'll ever get the chance to read them all.$3#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.$1
Entries.winter_Wed: I've just finished a book recently about the many types of monsters. I had forgotten a few from ages past.$3#$b#Terrible beasts that would roam the world during winter when they knew they couldn't be stopped. I'm glad they are gone.#0#$e#Have a good day, @. Learn something new.$1
Entries.winter_Thu: The ice is a friend and a foe, isn't it? Friend when you have a hot beverage, foe when you want to plant crops.$3#$b#Some of my friends specialize in studying ice in all forms, and their studies are double-edged indeed.$3#$e#Seek the energies, @. Enjoy the day.$1
Entries.winter_Fri: There are still some books left in this world that can impart special abilities on those who read them.#$b#Some can teach the reader entire languages if they have all four copies. Imagine that.$3#$e#Focus your mind today, @, and be at peace.$1
Entries.winter_Sat: It is now time to meditate till the spring, when the energies of the region return. To do any of my experiments now would be a mistake.#$b#Luckily, I have many things to read and think about, so not all is lost.$1#$e#Seek knowledge, seek answers. Have a good one.$1
Entries.winter_Sun: Much is still unknown amongst my colleagues about winter. As our energies are at their weakest, it makes it difficult to study.#$b#Someday we may be able to reverse the process and hold onto our energies, but until then, it's books for me.$1#$e#Be enchanted, @. Be at peace.$1
Entries.winter_Mon2: Since there's not much for me to do during this time of year, I tend to watch movies. I recently saw an interesting one...$3#$b#In it, a carrot fell in love with a grape, but their families were against it. They fought hard to be together, but in the end, were eaten.$3#$b#It was very sad, but also, quite colorful.$3#$e#Have a day to remember, @.$1
Entries.winter_Tue2: I make an effort to watch movies when I can. However, one of things I hate most are people who chew with their mouth open.#$b#I took an oath to never harm a living soul, and that oath is put to the test when someone chews aloud.$5#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.$9
Entries.winter_Wed2: What you call 'fantasy movies' I call 'comedy.' It amazes me all the things they get wrong.$1#$b#However, I'd be worried if they got things right. Our secrets aren't for the public, you know.$3#$e#Have a good day, @. Learn something new.$1
Entries.winter_Thu2: When I watch movies, I tend to like the ones that have a lot of special effects.#$b#How they pull it all off will always amaze me. If I didn't do what I do, I'd probably be a special effects artist.$3#$e#Seek the energies, @. Enjoy the day.$1
Entries.winter_Fri2: I recently found a book written in a language I had never seen before. Upon closer inspection, it's for people who code.#$b#This book claims to be from the beginning of the universe...what could it mean?$3#$e#Focus your mind today, @, and be at peace.$1
Entries.winter_Sat2: There is a new movie coming out that I am looking forward to. It is about a wizard with a scar on his arm that has a lot of adventures.$1#$b#It could be biographical for all I know!$1#$e#Seek knowledge, seek answers. Have a good one.$9
Entries.winter_Sun2: They are making a movie about 'Legend of the Prairie King.' It is one of my favorite games, but a movie?$2#$b#They never do game movies right. What if it turns off potential fans of the game?$0#$b#How do I know about that game? I have my ways.$3#$e#Be enchanted, @. Be at peace.$9
Entries.winter_Mon4: {{Random: The Shrine of Illusion has a unique origin, however there are many variations.#$b#Some believe it was born from the sun itself and crashed as a meteor. Others say it has always been.#$b#The truth, once I recall it, is far more interesting.$1#$e#Have a day to remember, @.$9 @@ I wish I could go into town to get seeds for my garden, but going into Pierre's store is a little awkward for me.$0#$e#And that Joja monstrosity isn't even worth mentioning.$3#$e#Have a day to remember, @.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.winter_Tue4: The being who created the Shrine of Illusion was none-other than a young girl, who wished on a stone to change her appearance to escape her terrible life.#$b#The stone granted her this power, and she turned into a hawk and flew away. When the girl's father found out, he was mad.#$b#He then threw the rock into a lake, to be forgotten forever.#$b#Come back tomorrow, and I'll tell you the rest.$7#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.$1
Entries.winter_Wed4: {{Random: The Shrine of Illusion, as a rock, needed to get out of the lake it was thrown in, so it absorbed all the gold at the bottom of the lake until it shone magnificently.#$b#It attracted the girl who had become a hawk, and told her what had happened.#$b#To get revenge, the shrine turned the girl into a bear, and she scared her father.#$b#I'll tell you more tomorrow.$1#$e#Have a good day, @. Learn something new.$1 @@ How goes your interactions with the Junimos, @?$0#$e#I've encountered a few now. They're certainly a strange sort.$3#$e#Have a good day, @. Learn something new.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.winter_Thu4: {{Random: The Father, realizing what he'd done, pulled the Shrine out of the Lake, and begged for forgiveness. The girl flew away, but the Shrine demanded it be taken to the king.#$b#Once at the king, the story stops. The kingdom, the king, the girl, what happened to them is lost to history.$3#$b#Bit anti-climactic, but such is the way with stories of this nature. Why not ask the Shrine yourself?#1#$e#Seek the energies, @. Enjoy the day.$9 @@ Today, I'm strengthening the wards that protect the valley. I'm happy to do the work of maintaining them.$0#$e#Seek the energies, @. Enjoy the day.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.winter_Fri4: I personally believe the Shrine of Illusion has a grand purpose not yet realized. What it could be exactly I'm not sure of, yet I feel it.#$b#Will it ever return to being a humble stone? Is it waiting for the return of the girl-turned-hawk? Many secrets still remain.$3#$e#Focus your mind today, @, and be at peace.$1
Entries.winter_Sat4: The Shrine of Illusion can only change our appearance, and does not turn us into animals, yet it's recorded that it has.$3#$b#I wonder if I could unlock that ability again? Maybe if I ask with a sweet voice.$1#$e#Seek knowledge, seek answers. Have a good one.$1
Entries.winter_Sun4: {{Random: I've been reading up on legends of old lately, and found a new one that the Shrine of Illusion was involved in.$3#$b#There once was a frog who wished to be human, and it asked the Shrine for such a wish.$0#$b#The Shrine granted him his desire, but demanded gold. The frog had no gold, so as a human he stole some. The frog was then thrown in jail, and that's where he died.$0#$b#Brutal, isn't it? I feel bad for the frog.$2#$e#Be enchanted, @. Be at peace.$1 @@ Doing well today, @?$1#$e#Glad to hear it. I'm heading into the woods to forage for ingredients later.$9#$e#Be enchanted, @. Be at peace.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.winter_Mon6: Lately, I have had troubled dreams in which I meet the children I've never had. They ask about me, where I have been, what I have done.#$b#I wake up with a hollow feeling, it's strange. I've always wanted to have children, and yet...$2#$b#So it goes. I wonder what it all means?$3#$e#Have a day to remember, @.$1
Entries.winter_Tue6: {{Random: My perplexing dreams continue, night by night. Regrets and choices gone bad assail my subconscious as soon as I drift into unconsciousness.$10#$b#To question oneself is natural, yet this goes well and beyond...$11#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.$0 @@ Why do I choose to live out in the forest on my own?$3#$b#Largely because it's more convenient for my magic. It's in close proximity to the magical spots in the forest. Not to mention, my cauldron occasionally produces some very strange smells.$0#$b#I'd inevitably receive complaints.$9#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.winter_Wed6: In my dreams I've been fighting a version of myself that has only existed in theory.#$b#It is an evil version, where all my desires were realized and driven him mad. He tries to get out, and each night, I stop him.#$b#How much longer will it go on for? It is uncertain.$2#$e#Have a good day, @. Learn something new.$1
Entries.winter_Thu6: My dreams are haunting me into the day. Children that don't exist, my evil side...$11#$b#Only during Winter are such assaults possible. I'm too weak, @! Seeing you inspires me to keep fighting.$1#$e#Seek the energies, @. Enjoy the day.$7
Entries.winter_Fri6: I have not slept. I refuse to confront my dreams again.$10#$b#Instead, I've been...trying to...read...books...$11#$b#...$11#$e#...$11
Entries.winter_Sat6: {{Random: I am refreshed today, and I've come to terms with my feelings. I may not be a father, but I can still be a good person.$9#$b#I hope you forgive my oddness of late, @. You have seen me in a moment of weakness.$4#$e#Seek knowledge, seek answers. Have a good one.$1 @@ Olivia certainly has some strange ideas about mysticism. I wonder what they teach her in those yoga classes.$0#$e#I may take her on for some tutelage to make sure she's on the right track...$3#$e#Seek knowledge, seek answers. Have a good one.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.winter_Sun6: Today I will focus on the positive things. I have a new friend in you, @. For that I am thankful.$7#$b#Here's to spring coming soon! It will be wonderful.$7#$e#Be enchanted, @. Be at peace.$1
Entries.winter_Mon8: {{Random: I will now tell you why I went down the path to live this life. It is quite the story.#$b#Long ago, when I was young, my mother became very ill.$3#$b#At first, she was just a little sick, but it got worse. I watched her die in front of my eyes.$2#$b#It was so horrible. I had heard that there was a chance she could be healed if one could manipulate the energies...$8#$b#I'll tell you the rest tomorrow.$0#$e#Have a day to remember, @.$1 @@ Are you close to Abigail...?$3#$b#I wish I knew how to approach her to get to know her better.$0#$e#...We probably shouldn't discuss it, @. Sorry for bringing it up.$2#$e#Have a day to remember, @.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.winter_Tue8: After traveling far to find a cure for my mother, I found an old woman who understood how to heal. I tried to bring her to my mother, but she, too, was sick.#$b#She didn't last the trip. Then, when I returned to my mother, she had passed.$2#$b#If I had been able to heal, I could have cured my mother. If I had been able to heal, I could have saved the old woman.$0#$b#I'll tell you even more tomorrow.$0#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.$1
Entries.winter_Wed8: {{Random: After I buried my mother, a man approached me. He had heard about my story, and wanted to teach me in arts. I then began to learn under him, and when he died, I continued his work.#$b#I have sought long and read much to find an answer: how can I cure people using the energies? Someday, I hope, I will know.$1#$e#Have a good day, @. Learn something new, and thank you for hearing my story.$7 @@ You know, I felt you were special from the first time we met.$0#$e#And I have to admit, I found it quite charming when you took that whiff from my cauldron and went so green I thought you were going to turn into a frog.$7#$e#Have a good day, @. Learn something new.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.winter_Thu8: Learning and studying has been my focus for such a long time, I've forgotten how old I actually am.$3#$b#I still wonder if I will ever succeed, but it's hard to know. What do you think?$1#$e#Seek the energies, @. Enjoy the day.$7
Entries.winter_Fri8: What if one could cure the dead? Or perhaps even stop people from death? Would that be a power for good, or evil?$2#$b#What if you charged people for immortality? What if only the rich lived forever? Such crazy futures...it's best not to think about it.$3#$e#Focus your mind today, @, and be at peace.$7
Entries.winter_Sat8: I've seen a movie in which a man gets smarter, but his body disappears until he's nothing less than a husk.#$b#The last line was, 'and to think for a moment, I could understand forever.' I know how that character feels.$10#$e#Seek knowledge, seek answers. Have a good one.$1
Entries.winter_Sun8: My mother's grave is long lost, but I still go to where I remember it to be. One of these days, I'll be there with the answer.#$b#Then I won't feel like such a failure.#$e#Be enchanted, @. Be at peace.$1
Entries.winter_Mon10: I wish I could reveal my true name to you, @. In truth, I just don't remember it.$4#$b#Was it Carl? Or Hank? Maybe John?$3#$b#I think it was a good name. It's hard to know.$3#$e#Maybe it was @! Imagine that?$1
Entries.winter_Tue10: {{Random: I am always happy to spend time with you, @. It's great seeing you.$7#$b#How is the farm? Are you happy? Tell me everything.$1#$e#Every day is a good day when @ shows up.$6 @@ You know, despite living outside the town, I do enjoy the company of the people in this valley.$1#$b#Yours most of all, of course.$6 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.winter_Wed10: It is my hope that our conversations have inspired you in some way, as you have inspired me.$7#$b#Together we are stronger than being alone, and for that, thank you.$1#$e#Who knows? If we hadn't met, I'd just talk to myself.
Entries.winter_Thu10: {{Random: There is a great feeling in our relationship. I hope someday to be able to be as natural as I am with you with the whole village.$7#$b#They still fear but, someday, hopefully, they'll give me a chance. You have.$1#$e#That's made all the difference.$9 @@ Are you staying safe, @?$3#$b#I have to admit, I've grown a little protective of you. Perhaps I'll put together a charmed amulet of defense.$0#$e#It's up to you if you want to wear it, of course.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.winter_Fri10: {{Random: My name is...I still don't remember.$3#$b#Yes, Magnus Rasmodius is not, in fact, my real name.$3#$b#I made it as an alias upon beginning my magic practice, but with time, eventually I and everyone around me forgot my original name.#$b#What is it, do you not like Rasmodius? We're you planning on taking it?$1 @@ Any plans for the weekend?$1#$b#I would be honored if you'd like to spend part of it with me.$4 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.winter_Sat10: What a year it has been. I'm glad we have grown so close, @. It would have been very boring without you.$6#$b#Just me and the Shrine of Illusion, making faces at each other.$1#$e#I still make faces at the Shrine. I'm not sure it appreciates it.$7
Entries.winter_Sun10: {{Random: All in all, remember this, @: the only energy you truly need is your own.$1#$b#Use that logic, and seize the day. Let nothing stop you!$7#$e#Unless it's not a good idea, in which case, don't do it.$3 @@ We should take a trip together into the forest soon, @...$3#$b#There are all kinds of secret places I'd like to show you.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Event_Mine_1: Well take a look around somewhere else. This place is damn dangerous.#$b#No place for a farmer.
Entries.event_quest1: Excellent. You have been chosen for an important task, @. Do not falter.
Entries.event_quest2: ...The spirits in the Community Center? Have you forgotten already? I thought to find you more keen of mind. Well, no matter. Do try not to disappoint them, won't you?
Entries.event_quest3: Not precisely the confidence-inspiring answer I had hoped for, but no matter.
Entries.event_elemental2: ...That would be a slime. I shall not pass your ignorance along to them; for that you may count yourself lucky.
Entries.event_speakof1: Is it, indeed? I had no idea. Though it seems impractical to summon you forth whenever we wish to speak about you, I will endeavor to do so in the future. I thank you for teaching me this nicety.
Entries.event_fate1: Yes, I sensed you might say that. The spirits have chosen well; I trust you will do great things.$1
Entries.event_fate2: Nevertheless, you must. Seldom are we given any choice in such matters. Sooner or later you will have to make a decision... for better or for worse.
Entries.event_fate3: Mmm. It is a dark energy that swirls around you. I hope only that it will not destroy you. These are dangerous powers you meddle with. Tread carefully.
Entries.event_slang1: What is the scene? How proceeds your life? What is popping?$11
Entries.event_slang2: Indeed! I have had an eye-opening experience with a modern invention called the television.$1
Entries.event_slang3: Ah... that was not my intent.$10
Entries.event_skillz2: Ah ha!$1#$b#Excellent. I knew that comprehension of such simple arts could not be beyond my grasp.$9
Entries.event_moarskillz1: ...It seems I misjudged. Perhaps Linus will be of help...$3
Entries.event_moarskillz2: Truly!?$1#$b#Ahem. This pleases me greatly. I look forward to our future encounters.
Entries.event_moarskillz3: I... see. I should not have asked.$2
Entries.event_sleep1: Alas, exhaustion does nothing to aid me.$2
Entries.event_sleep2: I have tried that. To no avail.$3
Entries.event_sleep3: That... is a nice sentiment. I fear thoughts of where I have come from will only sabotage my efforts, however.$2
Entries.divorced: {{Random: You have no business here. Leave me be. @@ You want...?#$b#I see. It's happening again, then.$2#$e#Is it a problem with me? Maybe...maybe I'm just not the marrying kind.$8#$e#I suppose that's not your problem anymore...$10 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.breakUp: ...Ah. Well, if that's your decision, @, then I'm hardly going to argue.$0#$b#I won't say I'm not hurt, though.$0#$e#I'd like to be alone, then, if you don't mind.$2
Entries.dumped_Guys: I may take a long trip to Castle Village soon. I have some thinking I need to do.$2#$e#I really don't have much to say to you right now, @.$2
Entries.secondChance_Guys: ...You want to try again?$2#$b#I've missed you more than I can say, so I'm willing. But really...I don't do well with heartbreak. Please don't toy with me.$2#$e#I know I can be a little distant, but it's more than possible to hurt me.$8

Entries.Wizard0: Words cannot express what it means to me to join hands with you.$6
Entries.Wizard1: Ever will I stand by your side.$1

Entries.Indoor_Day_Wizard: {{Random: I entered this room in search of... something...$3#$e#What was it...?$3 @@ Good morning, my heart.$6#$e#I believe I will try that spell of conjuring again, today.$7#$b#What do you have planned?$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Indoor_Night_Wizard: {{Random:Ever glad am I to return to your side each night.$1#$e#You enchant me, @.$6 @@ Welcome home, my heart. It has been a terribly long day in your absence.$6#$e#No, nothing in particular happened. I merely missed you.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Outdoor_Wizard: {{Random: If a chicken and a half laid an egg and a half in a day and a half...$10#$e#How long did the orange peel lay on the floor...?$11 @@ Your farm truly is extraordinary, @.$3#$b#Have you any idea how much attention you have attracted from across the veil?$1#$e#I need only stand here in the midst of it all to speak with them...$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.spring_Wizard: {{Random: The energies of the earth are most potent this time of year. It is beneficial to focus my studies accordingly.$2#$e#If you would like, I might teach you more about the threads that tangle every life on your farm together.$1 @@ I wish I could go back to the days of my youth for one more day. Go into the shop I always put off, talk to the librarians, learn even more.$3#$b#Those days are long gone, and all I have left of them is a shadow. Such is life.$0 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.summer_Wizard: {{Random: This heat is an affront to nature! Not even the elementals of fire could focus in such a stifling atmosphere$11#$e#I shall accomplish nothing until the sun sets.$11 @@ Anger and hatred, they are false energies. They hide the real sources of power, which is understanding and sadness.#$b#It has become cliche, but it's true. I have learned so much, and it still holds true. Find peace before you tear yourself to pieces. |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.winter_Wizard: {{Random: The elementals of water encompass the world in an icy embrace. All that remains for us to do is reach out and touch them.#$e#Will you reach with me, @?$1 @@ I feel drained today. Perhaps I should have remained in bed.$10#$e#The waning energies of this season do little for me.$11 |inputSeparator=@@}}

Entries.Rainy_Day_1: {{Random: Though a seed might hold all the potential for life, it is the rains that release it.$3#$b#Earth and water are as a lock and key.$1 @@ The weather is perfect for a summoning ritual.$1#$b#The morning is best for it. I think that open patch outside...$3#$e#You don't need those crops, do you?$11 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: {{Random: Ah! Gone is the glaring light of the sun!$1#$b#Today shall be a productive one. I hope to same for you, @.$7 @@ Ah, excellent weather. I'll be busy today; the energies flow like a river, today. It would be a waste not to take advantage.$1#$b#Yes, outdoors. Where else would I do it?$3#$e#Hmm...? Yes, I will be soaked.$3#$b#You're welcome to handle that however you like, but only after I've completed my spell.$9 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: {{Random: This weather reminds me of a night I spent holed up in a rickety old miner's cabin in the middle of no where. Back when I was young and foolish, I would lose track of time and weather while absorbed in my work.$3#$b# I hardly noticed the storm until it was right on top of me, and the valley threatened to wash me away.$3#$b#Thankfully, I found the cabin before then. Even so, I feared all night that it would collapse on top of me.$1#$e#Hm? What do you mean I still lose track of things while working?$3#$b#I have no idea what you're talking about.$3 @@ The elementals of water surround us. There is no time to waste!$1#$b#I will be hard at my work, this day.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: {{Random: Ah ha!$1#$b#This weather brings with it deep understanding of the relationship between the energies of the sky and air. I must write this down.$1#$e#Now where did I put my notebook?$3#$e#Stay in with me, today. I'll give you another lesson in elementals.$6 @@ Were I a domestic husband, I would offer to make you a hot dinner after the day you will inevitably spend in this storm.#$b#But I'm not. Entries.Rainy_Night_0: {{Random: Ah, @! You are utterly sodden!$1#$b#Come. Allow me to warm you.$6 @@ There is something comfortable about being isolated here in the rain, with no one else around.$9#$e#Aren't you ready to come to bed?$6 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: {{Random: I have heard that it is common in marriage for one to make the other a hot meal on a cold day's end.$3#$b#I fear my skills do not extend to that realm... but I found this in the fridge... Entries.Indoor_Day_2: {{Random: Come, @, let us meditate.$1#$e#You shall never improve if you never practice.$9 @@ @, core of my heart.$6#$b#Did you sleep well?$1#$e#I did, with you beside me.$6 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: {{Random: I attempted to make breakfast for you, this morning.$11#$e#Attempted, being the operative word.$10#$e#I am afraid you will have to make do on your own.$10 @@ Nngh... Home at last.$1#$b#How did I survive so long without you?$6#$e#Yet another mystery.$7 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: {{Random: I encountered young Leah, today, in the forest. When she beheld me, she said 'what is up, canis lupus familiaris?' and began laughing uncontrollably.$11#$e#Is this some conversational ritual I am unfamiliar with?$10 @@ Are you through with your work for the day?$1#$b#Might I convince you to... join me in bed?$6 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: {{Random: @. Core of my heart. Welcome home, my love.$1#$b#It is difficult for me to understand how I lived so long without you, when each day I spend every minute awaiting your return.$9#$e#Except the minutes when I commune with the energies. Sometimes I lose those minutes. But every other minute, my mind is yours.$6 @@ Come to bed, my heart. My arms have been too long without you.$6 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Outdoor_0: {{Random: Have you ever experienced crop circles on your farm?#$e#Some say they are the work of aliens. Fools. Did they never think to look at what was right under their noses?$3#$b#Of course it is the elementals.$1 @@ The air is crisp and clear. Entries.Outdoor_1: {{Random: Ah, @, you're just in time.$1#$b#I am about to begin my meditation to reach across plains. Entries.Outdoor_2: {{Random: I require some space to perform a ritual. Entries.Outdoor_3: {{Random: The summoning circle is complete!$1#$b#Now I only need to collect a few more supplies...$3#$e#Ah... incidentally... you didn't need those... crops in the far field, did you...?$10 @@ Your farm truly is extraordinary, @$3.#$b#Have you any idea how much attention you have attracted from across the veil?$1#$e#I need only stand here in the midst of it all to speak with them...$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Outdoor_4: {{Random: Some days I find myself sluggish and lethargic, in spite of a full night's sleep.$3#$b#The energies are a fickle thing.#$e#But seeing you hard at work energizes me.$1 @@ Have an enchanted day, my heart.$1#$e#I would offer to have dinner ready on your return, but we both know that would end poorly.$7 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.OneKid_0: {{Random: Despite the focus I have on my studies, I had always wanted to be a father. At long last, I can see this wish come true.$1#$e#Just one more thing you have granted me.$7 @@ Have you seen %kid1, recently?$3#$e#What? No. Of course I didn't lose our child$11#$b#Everything is under control.$9 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.OneKid_1: {{Random: I have come to realize how little I understand about children. If I thought communication with humans was difficult, it is nothing compared to communication with a child. Why does %kid1 not heed me?$10#$b# I have tried every language I have at my disposal!$11#$e#What do you mean babies do not speak?$10 @@ Sometimes I can hardly believe that we have a child.$1#$e#Then I remember you trust me enough to leave me alone with said child and everything else seems much less mysterious in comparison.$7 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.OneKid_2: {{Random: %kid1 is not so different from an elemental: born of the energies of the universe, unforgiving, and utterly incomprehensible.$1#$e#Do you think %kid1 would like swamp moss, as well? I believe I have some here, somewhere...$3 @@ I will feed %kid1, this morning, so you can focus on your work.$1#$e#Yes, I know. Raw eggplant is not breakfast.$7#$b#I remember.$7 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.OneKid_3: {{Random: You aren't leaving us here alone, are you?$3#$b#Is that... entirely wise?$3#$b#Very well, but I sense there is at least a fifty percent chance that either %kid1 or I will not survive your absence.$11#$e#Wait! Before you leave!#$b#How does a pacifier function?$3#$b#Is there milk in the fridge? What temperature should I heat it to?$3#$b#How long should %kid1 nap?$3#$b#What if %kid1 cries?$11#$b#Will you be back for lunch? Dinner?$3#$b#How do I change a diaper?$3#$b#What is the purpose of a baby blanket?!$3#$e#Please return soon.$10 @@ Our whole lives have changed with %kid1, here.$1#$e#I don't regret a thing.$7 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.TwoKids_0: {{Random: When I said I wished to be a father, I do not think I fully understood the implications.$3#$b#What I meant was that I should like to have the knowledge that I had brought a life into this world, and to watch a child grow to maturity and strength before they moved on to do good unto the world.$3#$e#I did not realize that involved quite so much work.$1 @@ Do you ever stand here and marvel at the two beautiful children our love has brought into the world?$9#$e#I do every day.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.TwoKids_1: {{Random: Do you find it unsettling that %kid1 and %kid2 might have a half-sibling among the villagers?$3 @@ %kid1 got into my surpluss potion ingredients, the other day.#$b#I believe that is a sign: it is high time for formal training to begin.$3#$e#%kid2 is still too young, but %kid1 is old enough to grasp the basics of energy flow and bridging...$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.TwoKids_2: {{Random: I went to work in my tower, the other day, expecting increased productivity in the quiet...#$b#and yet, as soon as %kid1 and %kid2 were out of my sight, I felt an ache of longing to hold them in my arms once more. I could not even focus for long enough to complete a single ritual.$2#$e#Is this what it means to be a father?$3 @@ We're blessed that %kid1 and %kid2 have your features$7.#$e#It would be a cruel twist of fate indeed for any child to look like me.$9 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Twokids_3: {{Random: %kid1 has your eyes. Sometimes we lock gazes and I find myself lost in them. I wonder what a child sees when looking upon one such as I.$3#$e#A father, I hope. And nothing less.$1 @@ This life... with you and our children...$4#$b#It's more than I ever thought I would have.$1#$e#Thank you, @, for choosing me.$6 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Good_0: {{Random: Once I was a young man, foolish and restless and hungry for knowledge.#$b#I used to lament the loss of those days - it is an oft-stated tragedy that youth is wasted on the young - but I have come to realize that such days of vibrant energy are not lost to me.$1#$b#You have brought them back, @.$7#$e#You give me life anew, as I never expected to have.$1#$b#For this I can never repay you, but ever will I try.$1 @@ I still cannot believe that you chose to marry me...$6 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Good_1: {{Random: The dark dreams of my past are a fading memory. When I sleep at your side, not only do I sleep - an uncommon enough occurrence, once - but I sleep soundly.$1#$b#That is your doing. The calm of your soul soothes mine.$9#$e#When you are with me, I am invigorated.$1 @@ Not even in all of my forays into the future did I predict I could ever be so happy as you have made me.$6 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Good_3: {{Random: @.$6#$b#My @.$6#$b#How effortlessly you make me forget my flaws and past failures!$7#$b#When I see myself through your eyes, it is as if I have been reborn. That you could know all you know of me and still love me so is beyond even my comprehension.$1#$b#I am undeserving of such devotion, but nevertheless I thank you for it.$1#$e#Never will I fail you. I swear it.$6 @@ My love, you look simply radiant.$6 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Good_4: {{Random: Have I expressed, lately, how I feel for you? If not, I have been remiss.$1#$b#My love for you overwhelms every other truth of my soul. Without you, I was a husk of a man, adrift in a world without meaning and lamenting my place in it.$6#$b#With you, I am as a slate wiped clean.#$e#I have no regrets, anymore.$6 @@ This... this is more home than ever my tower was. Or any place I dwelled before that.$1#$e#From now on, my home is with you. My heart.$6 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Good_5: {{Random: Any trace of that loneliness which once plagued me is banished by your presence. I had no idea how much I craved a contact outside the ethereal before our paths crossed.$6#$b#And now our souls are entwined as two trees grown together.$6#$e#It would take an axe to separate us.$6 @@ @... this wedding amulet it's flawless.$4#$b#You know I don't care for trinkets without practical use, but this...$4#$b#This is a symbol of us.$6#$e#It is more important than anything else I have ever owned.$6 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Good_6: If you venture into the mines, beware, my heart.#$b#I have told you before of the evil that lurks there.$2#$b#I don't know what I would do if you fell prey...$8
Entries.Good_7: @. This house is a home because of all the work you do.$1#$b#Never let yourself believe I don't notice.$1
Entries.Good_8: Sometimes, seeing all you do for us, I wonder how I survived before you married me.$3#$e#Then I remember I once subsisted an entire week on swamp moss and algae broth because my food delivery was delayed in a winter storm...$7
Entries.Good_9: This peace...$9#$b#This is what I always craved and never thought I would feel again.$4#$e#Thank you, @.$6
Entries.Neutral_0: {{Random: I hope you won't regret your decision to marry me when my hair turns grey and you are still quite young...$2 @@ Joy is a mysterious power. Fragile in its most pure state, when it does appear it can resonate through the ages.$3#$b#Yet, that same joy can become corrupted over time. It must be protected, at all cost.$0 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Neutral_1: {{Random: There are potent energies about your grandfather's shrine.$3#$b#Do you think he would be proud of how far you have come?$1#$e#I believe he is.$1 @@ Anger and hatred, they are false energies. They hide the real sources of power, which is understanding and sadness.#$b#It has become cliche, but it's true. I have learned so much, and it still holds true. Find peace before you tear yourself to pieces. |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Neutral_2: {{Random: Ah, @. Come for another lesson on the energies? I'm happy to oblige.$9#$e#It means more time with you.$1 @@ Using the energies comes at a cost. It's not free. To discuss all the different aspects would take ages.$3#$b#I'll tell you this though, @. My hair was not originally purple.$1#$e#That was a long time ago...$7 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Neutral_3: {{Random: I once thought I would live out the rest of my days locked away in that tower without even a single friend...$2#$e#You set that ambition on its nose$1#$b#Not that I'm complaining.$7 @@ I once saw a person try to keep a tree alive all year long, using powerful energies to do so.#$b#It was horrible: the tree itself wept, and begged to be freed. I had to step in and save the tree.$2#$b#I still have some of its leaves it gave to me as a gift. They are special to me.$2 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Neutral_4: {{Random: Hmm...? Yes, I'll pick up the pile of books as soon as I'm finished...$9 @@ If you go into town, make sure and say 'what's popping?' to everyone for me.$7 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Neutral_5: How are we doing, financially, @?$3#$e#If there is anything I can do, you need only ask.$0
Entries.Neutral_6: Another day, another mystery to solve...$7
Entries.Neutral_7: Have you been practicing meditation, like I taught you?$9
Entries.Neutral_8: Hmm?$3#$b#Mess? No. I haven't noticed any.$11
Entries.Neutral_9: If you find yourself obsessed with something you've never been interested before, it can mean you have been enchanted.$3#$b#Not all enchantments are bad, of course. Some can be quite positive. It is very mysterious.$1#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.$9
Entries.Bad_0: {{Random: You know I have been married once before and it went badly. I would not like for this to go the same direction.$2#$e#I do not think my heart would survive the breaking for a second time.$8 @@ ...Do you still love me?$2 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Bad_1: {{Random: Black omens darken the horizons of our future.#$b#Will you heed the signs and change course, or will you continue as you have been?#$e#Do not make a choice you will later regret, @.$10 @@ ...I should never have married again.$11 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Bad_2: {{Random: This is... hmm. Interesting. If I can just focus my energies, I might be able to...$2#$e#...#$e#Hm? Begone; I am busy. You would not understand something so delicate. @@ You regret it, don't you?$2#$b#Your choice to marry me.$8 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Bad_3: {{Random: And so begins the fall beyond the summit... The descent will not be as joyous as the climb was, I fear.$10#$b#I wonder if we will catch our bearings before the landslide crumbles out of control...$2#$e#It pains me to look back and see how far we have fallen, already.$8 @@ Have I done something wrong...? It seems everything is falling apart, lately...$8 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Bad_4: {{Random: Hmph. @@ I had hoped I would only ever live through one broken heart...$8 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Bad_5: I should never have let you marry me.$10#$b#I seem only to make your life worse.$8
Entries.Bad_6: We only have one short life to live... is this the best way to do it?$10
Entries.Bad_7: If there is anything I can do to fix this, please, tell me!$2#$b#I'm not ready to fail again as I have done in the past.$8
Entries.Bad_8: You have been so cold to me lately...
Entries.Bad_9: If only I had been better for you...$8
Entries.funLeave_Wizard: I require some things from my tower; if you seek me there, today, you will find me.#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.$7
Entries.funReturn_Wizard: To return to this home we share is a relief. Never before had I thought of my tower as empty, and yet it feels that way without you there.$1#$e#I passed a productive day, nevertheless.#$b#Come, let us be together and share in each other's memories.$7
Entries.spring_1: The energies have begun again. Spring is here, and the year is reborn.$9#$e#I feel renewed this year, not just because spring is the time for it, but because of my relationship with you, @.$6#$b#You have reminded me that I am still human. To focus on being human is a mystery itself that I almost forgot about.$9#$e#Thank you, @.$1
Entries.spring_2: I am always glad to wake beside you, @. I had predicted we would become friends, but I had no idea how far it would go.$1#$b#There are many mysteries in this world, and I am glad you chose me as one of yours.$6#$e#I count myself to be very lucky indeed.$7
Entries.spring_3: Many people are scared of me. The unknown causes them to tremble, and my association with it frightens them.#$b#You have continued to show you don't mind the mysterious. You embrace it, and take time out of your day to see me.$1#$b#Thank you, @. I thought I would be alone forever.$7#$e#You are a special person, indeed.$6
Entries.spring_5: I feel renewed this year, not just because spring is the time for it, but because of my relationship with you, @.$6#$b#You have reminded me that I am still human. To focus on being human is a mystery itself that I almost forgot about.$1#$e#Thank you, @.$1
Entries.spring_6: The air is electric, I feel this year will be a special one. Let us do our best to achieve our dreams, @.$1#$e#Do not give up. I will be with you.$1
Entries.spring_8: The greatest energies are the ones we allow ourselves to find. Everything else is false.$1#$b#Be true to what moves you, and you will be energized the rest of your life.$1#$e#That is my hope for you, @. Live forever!$7
Entries.spring_13: What, exactly, is the purpose of hidden eggs?$3#$b#Is there some symbolism I don't comprehend?$3#$b#The eggs, perhaps, represent that which you need but do not desire, and so you seek because you must.$3#$e#No...?$3#$e#Of course I'm not going.#$b#I have quite enough mystery in my life without incomprehensible traditions.$1
Entries.spring_23: The energies, at their core, are chaotic. Ever changing, they are denser than air yet more elusive than wind.$3#$b#In the end, many people believed it was not worth trying to solve the mystery, yet here I remain.$0#$e#Someday, @, I will truly understand.$1
Entries.summer_1: Summer has come at last. The energies are at their most powerful. I'll get a lot of work done this season.$1#$b#Stay cool, @, and do not let the sun curse you.$9#$e#Maybe we'll go swimming this time...$4
Entries.summer_2: I still marvel that you would ever choose to be with one such as me. I am much too old and jaded for someone so full of life. And yet, here we are.$7#$e#You are the mystery I will never solve. Have an enchanted day, @.$1
Entries.summer_3: Ignorance is bliss. You've heard that saying before, I'm sure, but it's true. To know too much, it can turn one bitter.#$b#I still find hope in my studies, but some days, it is nearly too much to bear. Thank you for choosing me, @.$1#$e#You are what holds me to this reality.$1
Entries.summer_4: The focus on my life has always been on my studies now. Everything else fell away.#$b#Becoming close with you, though, has made me realize that maybe I should not be so consumed by the search for knowledge..$1#$b#There's more to life than reading the books about the lives of the dead.$9#$b#Now there is you.$6#$e#I am with you, @. I always will be.$6
Entries.summer_5: Using the energies comes at a cost. It's not free. To discuss all the different aspects would take ages.#3#$b#I'll tell you this though, @. My hair was not originally purple.#7#$e#That was a long time ago...$3
Entries.summer_8: There is a special energy in the air today. I can feel it, can you?$1#$b#It is the energy of our love! It is invigorating. It makes me feel young again.$1#$e#Is that weird? I don't get out much, @.$9
Entries.summer_11: I have no interest in this governor, nor in the pomp and ceremony designed to impress him.#$b#But I will attend the festival.$1#$e#The activity on the beach draws out curious merfolk.$3#$b#It provides me a unique opportunity to converse with them.$1
Entries.summer_15: One can get so caught up in work that life just falls away. Others retreat to their work because they cannot handle their life.#$b#I'm realizing lately that I've done a lot of things that I wasn't happy with. Forced myself to do what was wrong for what I thought was right.$2#$b#I hope to someday get forgiveness, @.$0#$e#Someday.$1
Entries.summer_28: The season of the Lunaloos is upon us.$9#$b#Of all the peculiar things people in this town choose to celebrate, this is the one I can understand.$1#$e#I would prefer to avoid the crowds on the docks, however.#$b#I'm sure you'll find me, regardless.$1#$b#You always do.$7
Entries.fall_1: Can you feel the changes in the air? I don't just mean in the temperature. The trees, they are giving off a unique energy.#$e#May this fall be an enchanted one.$1
Entries.fall_2: Studying and using the energies can make one very tired, @. All these years of it has brought me to the brink.#$b#Yet it is my curiosity that drives me. I don't have all the answers, and there are still questions I have.$3#$b#Like you, @. What continues to bring you back to me, time and again?$7#$e#Perhaps someday I will understand you.$1#$b#Then again, I enjoy the mystery.$9
Entries.fall_3: There have been times when I have had the chance to wield unlimited energy. Many would be tempted by such power.$3#$b#I am only human. I was lucky to reject them, for it would have destroyed me.#$b#All that glimmers is not always good, @.#$e#Who knows what I would have become? A scary thought.$2
Entries.fall_4: Am I a better person than I was before all this? In all my searching, have I been able to find a way to become stronger?$3#$b#I have answers to many mysteries, but they haven't changed me. They are only answers. Have I done all I can?$2#$e#I have thought about these things for a long time. My own mystery.$3
Entries.fall_8: It is difficult to remember what it is to have normal conversations. When conversing with the energies, one must speak a unique and complex language.#$b#To talk human is to ask how another is, and to do that with meaning is hard for me. Luckily, I can practice on you.$1#$e#What's up, dog? No? Is that not a saying?$3
Entries.fall_15: Words can't express how grateful I am for you, @. It is nice to be able to talk with someone about all the aspects of my work.$1#$e#...Amongst other things.$4
Entries.fall_16: My old friend Welwick has come to town for the fair.$1#$b#Her divination skills outshine even mine.$9
Entries.fall_25: I have been focusing my energies lately to find the answer to this question: how is it that when I'm out and about I'm tired, but when I try to sleep, I cannot?$3#$b#It is a grand mystery, @. Someday I will solve it.$2#$e#Until then, I count on your soothing presence to lull me to sleep each night.$6
Entries.fall_26: I will be making another maze for the festival, tonight.$1#$e#It's the only time of year I can contrive such a simple way for the elementals to observe the affairs of mundane folk so closely.$9
Entries.winter_1: It is a time for peace and study. The snow fall has made me weak, and I will rest.#$e#I hope this will be a special winter for us, @.$1
Entries.winter_2: I wish I could reveal my true name to you, @. In truth, I just don't remember it.$1#$b#Was it Carl? Or Hank? Maybe John?$3#$b#I think it was a good name. It's hard to know.$3#$e#Maybe it was @! Imagine that?$1
Entries.winter_4: My name is...I still don't remember.$3#$b#Yes, Magnus Rasmodius is not, in fact, my real name.$3#$b#I made it as an alias upon beginning my magic practice, but with time, eventually I and everyone around me forgot my original name.#$b#What is it, do you not like Rasmodius? We're you planning on taking it?$1
Entries.winter_6: All in all, remember this, @: the only energy you truly need is your own.$1#$b#Use that logic, and seize the day. Let nothing stop you!$7#$e#Unless it's not a good idea, in which case, don't do it.$10
Entries.winter_7: There is a great feeling in our relationship. I hope someday to be able to be as natural as I am with you with the whole village.$7#$b#They still fear but, someday, hopefully, they'll give me a chance. You have.$1#$e#That's made all the difference.$9
Entries.winter_8: Hmm...? The festival?#$b#I have no interest in fish or ice sculptures.#$b#And you know full well I'm no good at socialization.$11#$e#I think I will visit my tower, instead.$1#$b#In spite of the weak ambient energy this time of year, I believe I can muster the strength to occupy myself.$9
Entries.winter_15: Night Market?#$b#Bah! I have no time for such frivolous affairs.$3#$b#Not even the merfolk would bother with that light parade.$3#$e#By all means, enjoy yourself.$1#$b#It's just not for me.$9
Entries.winter_17: Happy... Birthday...?$3#$b#...Don't tell me I've forgotten your birthday.$10#$b#It's... mine? Ah, I guess it is.$3#$b#We don't have to do anything, my love. Spending time with you already makes me happier than you could ever imagine.$1#$e#If you really insist on celebrating, perhaps we could go to the Night Market tonight?$1#$b#I know I called it frivolous earlier, but it's a good excuse to get out of the house, no?$9
Entries.winter_25: All those people gather together to feast over the supposed good fortune of the Winter Star, and it isn't even a star.$3#$b#Not that anyone - excepting you, of course - would listen if I tried to tell them that, in the deep of winter, even an untrained eye can see the glimmer of of the astral plane.$1#$e#I do support a celebration of the waxing energies. But I don't support this ignorance.$3#$b#I will, of course, attend if you wish me to. But only for you, my love.$9
Entries.winter_28: What a year it has been. I'm glad we have grown so close, @. It would have been very boring without you.$6#$b#Just me and the Shrine of Illusion, making faces at each other.$1#$e#I still make faces at the Shrine. I'm not sure it appreciates it.$7
Entries.spouseRoom_Wizard: Strange Basilisks... Fundamentals Of Goblins... Unicorns of Timor-Leste...$3#$e#No, no, that's not it...$0#$e#Where did I leave that book...?$3
Entries.patio_Wizard: ...Hmm? It's a ritual circle.$3#$e#You remember. From our lessons.$1

Entries.fall_Wizard: {{Random: Wind blows swiftly between the elemental planes. Can you hear them whispering, as they pass us by?$3#$b#Shh! Listen.$1#$e#You make an adept young wizard, for a farmer.$7 @@ Enchantments, energies, and experiments. Though their powers are great and can do many things, they can't solve all of life's problems.#$b#They cannot, for example, make someone fall in love with another and have it be an honest relationship. It never ends well.$3 |inputSeparator=@@}}

Entries.Rainy_Day_Wizard: {{Random: Today is the day I decipher the secret of drought and flood!$1#$e#Seek knowledge, seek answers. Have a wonderful day, my love.$7 @@ Ah ha! The swelling energies have burst, and the rains come. Quickly! There is no time to lose.$7#$b#This is the best time to commune with certain elementals.$7#$e#Let's see... I will need... amethyst... black flame candles...$3#$b#Now where did I put that iridium?$3 @@ Mmm, the air is heavy with magic. Can you feel it?$9#$e#Stay in with me, today. I'll give you another lesson in elementals.$6|inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Rainy_Night_Wizard: {{Random:Your clothes are soaked through... We must remove them from you immediately.#$e#So that you do not catch cold!$1#$b#I have no ulterior motives!$4 @@ @, you are drenched!$2#$b#Just a moment. I have a spell...$7#$b#Ithikitalkus suh norn!$1#$b#There. Much better.$1#$e#...$3#$b#Drat. Why didn't I think to use wet clothes as an excuse before I dried them?$4 @@ We'll both rest well tonight.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Indoor_Day_Wizard: {{Random: I entered this room in search of... something...$3#$e#What was it...?$3 @@ Good morning, my heart.$6#$e#I believe I will try that spell of conjuring again, today.$7#$b#What do you have planned?$1 @@ What a comfortable home we've made together on this farm! Much nicer than a drafty tower.$9 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Indoor_Night_Wizard: {{Random:Ever glad am I to return to your side each night.$1#$e#You enchant me, @.$6 @@ Welcome home, my heart. It has been a terribly long day in your absence.$6#$e#No, nothing in particular happened. I merely missed you.$1 @@ Welcome home, @. I hope you didn't work yourself too hard today.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Outdoor_Wizard: {{Random: If a chicken and a half laid an egg and a half in a day and a half...$10#$e#How long did the orange peel lay on the floor...?$11 @@ Your farm truly is extraordinary, @$3.#$b#Have you any idea how much attention you have attracted from across the veil?$1#$e#I need only stand here in the midst of it all to speak with them...$1 @@ I've always preferred being outdoors to being cooped up inside. I find it limits one's view of the world too much.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.spring_Wizard: {{Random: The energies of the earth are most potent this time of year. It is beneficial to focus my studies accordingly.$2#$e#If you would like, I might teach you more about the threads that tangle every life on your farm together.$1 @@ I wish I could go back to the days of my youth for one more day. Go into the shop I always put off, talk to the librarians, learn even more.$3#$b#Those days are long gone, and all I have left of them is a shadow. Such is life.$0 @@ Care to take a walk in the woods with me later? I can show you some useful plants you can find in spring.$1|inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.summer_Wizard: {{Random: This heat is an affront to nature! Not even the elementals of fire could focus in such a stifling atmosphere$11#$e#I shall accomplish nothing until the sun sets.$11 @@ Anger and hatred, they are false energies. They hide the real sources of power, which is understanding and sadness.#$b#It has become cliche, but it's true. I have learned so much, and it still holds true. Find peace before you tear yourself to pieces. @@ There's nothing like a summer breeze to soothe the soul. And truthfully, I enjoy thunderstorms, as well.$0#$e#All the exciting crackling in the air.$1#$b#It's one of the few things I can bring myself to tolerate about summer.$10 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.winter_Wizard: {{Random: The elementals of water encompass the world in an icy embrace. All that remains for us to do is reach out and touch them.#$e#Will you reach with me, @?$1 @@ I feel drained today. Perhaps I should have remained in bed.$10#$e#The waning energies of this season do little for me.$11 @@ During winter, I typically take the time to reinforce the town wards and then get to reading.$0#$e#I've barely made it through a quarter of the books in my tower...$3|inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Rainy_Day_0: {{Random: The air is heavy with energy, today.$1#$b#Remember: rain is merely a gift from the plane of water.$1 @@ Ah ha! The swelling energies have burst, and the rains come. Quickly! There is no time to lose.$7#$b#This is the best time to commune with certain elementals.$7#$e#Let's see... I will need... amethyst... black flame candles...$3#$b#Now where did I put that iridium?$3 @@ All this rain will be good for the crops, even if it's bad for my cape.$1|inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: {{Random: Though a seed might hold all the potential for life, it is the rains that release it.$3#$b#Earth and water are as a lock and key.$1 @@ The weather is perfect for a summoning ritual.$1#$b#The morning is best for it. I think that open patch outside...$3#$e#You don't need those crops, do you?$11 @@ I know this may make me unusual, but rain puts me in a good mood.$1|inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: {{Random: Ah! Gone is the glaring light of the sun!$1#$b#Today shall be a productive one. I hope to same for you, @.$7 @@ Ah, excellent weather. I'll be busy today; the energies flow like a river, today. It would be a waste not to take advantage.$1#$b#Yes, outdoors. Where else would I do it?$3#$e#Hmm...? Yes, I will be soaked.$3#$b#You're welcome to handle that however you like, but only after I've completed my spell.$9 @@ After dinner tonight, shall we light a nice fire and curl up in front of it?$1#$e#It wouldn't mind conjuring a long lasting fire just for us.$6|inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: {{Random: This weather reminds me of a night I spent holed up in a rickety old miner's cabin in the middle of no where. Back when I was young and foolish, I would lose track of time and weather while absorbed in my work.$3#$b# I hardly noticed the storm until it was right on top of me, and the valley threatened to wash me away.$3#$b#Thankfully, I found the cabin before then. Even so, I feared all night that it would collapse on top of me.$1#$e#Hm? What do you mean I still lose track of things while working?$3#$b#I have no idea what you're talking about.$3 @@ The elementals of water surround us. There is no time to waste!$1#$b#I will be hard at my work, this day.$1 @@ The only criticism I have of robes is that they're irritatingly heavy when wet...$5|inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: {{Random: Ah ha!$1#$b#This weather brings with it deep understanding of the relationship between the energies of the sky and air. I must write this down.$1#$e#Now where did I put my notebook?$3#$e#Stay in with me, today. I'll give you another lesson in elementals.$6 @@ Were I a domestic husband, I would offer to make you a hot dinner after the day you will inevitably spend in this storm.#$b#But I'm not. You knew that before you married me, so I won't apologize.$10#$e#Unless you want burnt soup.$3#$b#Don't ask how - I would find a way to do it.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: {{Random: Ah, @! You are utterly sodden!$1#$b#Come. Allow me to warm you.$6 @@ There is something comfortable about being isolated here in the rain, with no one else around.$9#$e#Aren't you ready to come to bed?$6 @@ The day after a rain like this, the forest is rejuvenated. Tomorrow morning, the trees will be splendid.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: {{Random: I have heard that it is common in marriage for one to make the other a hot meal on a cold day's end.$3#$b#I fear my skills do not extend to that realm... but I found this in the fridge... [280 274 270 266 252 250]#$e#Perhaps you could make something and pretend I helped?$10 @@ ...burnt smell?$3#$b#No, I don't smell anything.$11#$e#In all seriousness, I did warn you I could find a way to burn soup.$7#$b#Let us not speak of this again.$11 @@ The sound of the rain on the roof is almost hypnotic, don't you think?$3 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: {{Random: On this stormy night, I ventured into the town for your benefit. I have acquired, from the saloon, something to warm you. [199 218 219 236]$3#$e#Perhaps we could pretend I made it?$1 @@ @, you are drenched!$2#$b#Just a moment. I have a spell...$7#$b#Ithikitalkus suh norn!$1#$b#There. Much better.$1#$e#...$3#$b#Drat. Why didn't I think to use wet clothes as an excuse before I dried them?$4 @@ I expended a great deal of mana today. A long rest will do me good.$9|inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: {{Random: I see the rains have blessed your hair. It is a rare occurrence, indeed, that I am the better groomed between us.$7 @@ The crackling of the fire is ever more inviting on a night like this.$9#$e#Sit with me awhile and watch the flames.$1#$b#I promise not to talk about elementals.$1#$b#...much.$7 @@ Your crops will certainly be appreciative of this weather.$7 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: {{Random: @, @, @.$6#$b#The earth has caressed you with a touch of rain.$7#$e#You are truly magnificent.$6 @@ Ah. Yes. Dinner.#$b#Well, you see, I tried a spell to create a magnificent feast, but magic is a funny thing, you know...$11#$e#I put out the fire before it spread.$11#$b#You probably can't even tell it was there.$10 @@ I should go check on my tower's garden in the morning.$0#$e#Ancient fruit need more water than most other plants. It's possibly the reason they almost went extinct...$3 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: {{Random: Good morning, @, my heart. How did you sleep?$1#$e#Beside you, I always sleep well.$9 @@ Good morning, my heart.$6#$e#I believe I will try that spell of conjuring again, today.$7#$b#What do you have planned?$1 @@ I think I'll do a little cleaning today. ...You won't blame me too much if I use some magic to help it along, right?$3|inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: {{Random: Today we continue your training. Have you been practicing, as I have showed you?$1#$e#Stand very still. You must forsake your ears listen with your mind.$1#$b#Only then will you truly understand the energies of the universe.$1 @@ Ah, @. You're just in time. I have made you breakfast. [201 210 211 194 195]$1#$e#What do you mean you thought I couldn't cook? I'm insulted.$7#$e#...#$b#Alright, I bought it.$11#$b#Can't you pretend I made it?$1 @@ I have a little ritual planned in here for later today.$0#$e#Don't worry, it won't make a mess.$1#$b#Probably...$11 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: {{Random: Come, @, let us meditate.$1#$e#You shall never improve if you never practice.$9 @@ @, core of my heart.$6#$b#Did you sleep well?$1#$e#I did, with you beside me.$6 @@ You keep the refrigerator very well-stocked with products of the farm.$0#$b#It makes it difficult for me to be useful by offering to do the shopping.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}

Make sure you take the time to relax this evening.$1#$e#%Magnus smiles at me. |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: {{Random: No, I did not attempt to make dinner. No, there is nothing in the sink.$10#$b#Burnt smell? What burnt smell?$11#$e#I have no idea what you speak of.$11 @@ Ah, @. Home at last.$1#$b#How did I survive so long without you?$6#$e#Yet another mystery.$7 @@ A long day for me. I'm happy to see the end of it...$0#$e#How was your day?$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: {{Random: I encountered young Leah, today, in the forest. When she beheld me, she said 'what is up, canis lupus familiaris?' and began laughing uncontrollably.$11#$e#Is this some conversational ritual I am unfamiliar with?$10 @@ Are you through with your work for the day?$1#$b#Might I convince you to... join me in bed?$6 @@ I've got some traveling to do for the Guild soon.
