Entries.Indoor_Night_4: {{Random: @. Core of my heart. Welcome home, my love.$1#$b#It is difficult for me to understand how I lived so long without you, when each day I spend every minute awaiting your return.$9#$e#Except the minutes when I commune with the energies. Sometimes I lose those minutes. But every other minute, my mind is yours.$6 @@ Come to bed, my heart. My arms have been too long without you.$6 @@ Remind me to show you the charm I've been working on recently. It's a spell of protection, but the effects are quite eye-catching.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Outdoor_0: {{Random: Have you ever experienced crop circles on your farm?#$e#Some say they are the work of aliens. Fools. Did they never think to look at what was right under their noses?$3#$b#Of course it is the elementals.$1 @@ The air is crisp and clear. I can feel the energies rising to meet me.$9#$b#I shall spend some time here, communing with the elementals.$1#$e#You don't mind if I use the porch, do you?$3 @@ *hums* Hello there, @! Wonderful day, isn't it?$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Outdoor_1: {{Random: Ah, @, you're just in time.$1#$b#I am about to begin my meditation to reach across plains. You should join me$1#$e#Practice makes perfect.$9 @@ I considered developing an enchantment to assist in your work...$3#$b#Unfortunately, my first attempt ended in tragedy.$2#$e#You don't want to know what happened.$11#$e#The animals are all completely fine.$10 @@ Have you been to Castle Village? I much prefer the air here. It's cleaner, crisper, and doesn't reek of magic.$0|inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Outdoor_2: {{Random: I require some space to perform a ritual. You don't mind if I use just a little bit, do you?#$e#I won't destroy much of anything.$3#$b#...unless things go wrong.$11 @@ Jyokilius pijus, ribe, agyce...#$b#Ah, @!$3#$b#You really should know better than to break my concentration mid spell.#$e#I might have set fire to the barn.$3#$e#Again.$10 @@ Growing things always bring a surplus of mana to the world around them. It's so concentrated on this farm that it's almost overwhelming.$0#$e#It feels so tremendously alive.$1|inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Outdoor_3: {{Random: The summoning circle is complete!$1#$b#Now I only need to collect a few more supplies...$3#$e#Ah... incidentally... you didn't need those... crops in the far field, did you...?$10 @@ Your farm truly is extraordinary, @$3.#$b#Have you any idea how much attention you have attracted from across the veil?$1#$e#I need only stand here in the midst of it all to speak with them...$1 @@ I'm running low on some of my potion supplies. I'll need to head into the forest to collect more soon.$3|inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Outdoor_4: {{Random: Some days I find myself sluggish and lethargic, in spite of a full night's sleep.$3#$b#The energies are a fickle thing.#$e#But seeing you hard at work energizes me.$1 @@ Have an enchanted day, my heart.$1#$e#I would offer to have dinner ready on your return, but we both know that would end poorly.$7 @@ I spotted a rare bird over the farm this morning. I wonder if it flew in from the Fern Islands.$3|inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.OneKid_0: {{Random: Despite the focus I have on my studies, I had always wanted to be a father. At long last, I can see this wish come true.$1#$e#Just one more thing you have granted me.$7 @@ Have you seen %kid1, recently?$3#$e#What? No. Of course I didn't lose our child$11#$b#Everything is under control.$9 @@ There's something magical about children, isn't there?$1#$b#Imagination without limits is a powerful tool.$9 @@ When our child is old enough, we should go for a vacation on Ginger Island.$3#$e#I'd like them to grow up with a wide view of the world, beyond just this little valley.$1|inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.OneKid_1: {{Random: I have come to realize how little I understand about children. If I thought communication with humans was difficult, it is nothing compared to communication with a child. Why does %kid1 not heed me?$10#$b# I have tried every language I have at my disposal!$11#$e#What do you mean babies do not speak?$10 @@ Sometimes I can hardly believe that we have a child.$1#$e#Then I remember you trust me enough to leave me alone with said child and everything else seems much less mysterious in comparison.$7 @@ Ah... All of the magical training in the world couldn't have prepared me for the challenge a dirty diaper presents.$7 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.OneKid_2: {{Random: %kid1 is not so different from an elemental: born of the energies of the universe, unforgiving, and utterly incomprehensible.$1#$e#Do you think %kid1 would like swamp moss, as well? I believe I have some here, somewhere...$3 @@ I will feed %kid1, this morning, so you can focus on your work.$1#$e#Yes, I know. Raw eggplant is not breakfast.$7#$b#I remember.$7 @@ I hope that our child contains the best parts of both of us. And hopefully not too many of the worst.$9 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.OneKid_3: {{Random: You aren't leaving us here alone, are you?$3#$b#Is that... entirely wise?$3#$b#Very well, but I sense there is at least a fifty percent chance that either %kid1 or I will not survive your absence.$11#$e#Wait! Before you leave!#$b#How does a pacifier function?$3#$b#Is there milk in the fridge? What temperature should I heat it to?$3#$b#How long should %kid1 nap?$3#$b#What if %kid1 cries?$11#$b#Will you be back for lunch? Dinner?$3#$b#How do I change a diaper?$3#$b#What is the purpose of a baby blanket?!$3#$e#Please return soon.$10 @@ Our whole lives have changed with %kid1, here.$1#$e#I don't regret a thing.$7 @@ Have you seen any hints of magical activity in our child? Well...the signs don't always show up this early.$3 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.TwoKids_0: {{Random: When I said I wished to be a father, I do not think I fully understood the implications.$3#$b#What I meant was that I should like to have the knowledge that I had brought a life into this world, and to watch a child grow to maturity and strength before they moved on to do good unto the world.$3#$e#I did not realize that involved quite so much work.$1 @@ Do you ever stand here and marvel at the two beautiful children our love has brought into the world?$9#$e#I do every day.$1 @@ Of all the beautiful places I've visited in the course of my work, none of them hold a candle to this farmhouse with our little family.$1#$e#%Magnus smiles at me. @@ I do hope at least one of our children decides to follow in my footsteps.$0#$e#I suppose that's a little vain, isn't it? But the world of magic is one I'd like all of us to share.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.TwoKids_1: {{Random: Do you find it unsettling that %kid1 and %kid2 have a half-sibling among the villagers?$3 @@ %kid1 got into my surpluss potion ingredients, the other day.#$b#I believe that is a sign: it is high time for formal training to begin.$3#$e#%kid2 is still too young, but %kid1 is old enough to grasp the basics of energy flow and bridging...$1 @@ Children aren't like cats, are they? Two really are twice as much work.$3#$b# ...At least.$10 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.TwoKids_2: {{Random: I went to work in my tower, the other day, expecting increased productivity in the quiet...#$b#and yet, as soon as %kid1 and %kid2 were out of my sight, I felt an ache of longing to hold them in my arms once more. I could not even focus for long enough to complete a single ritual.$2#$e#Is this what it means to be a father?$3 @@ We're blessed that %kid1 and %kid2 have your features$7.#$e#It would be a cruel twist of fate indeed for any child to look like me.$9 @@ I think I saw one of our children manifesting early signs of telekinesis today!$3#$e#A teddy bear slid right off a shelf...perhaps they summoned it!$3#$b#...Yes, I admit that the bear may have simply fallen down.$10 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Twokids_3: {{Random: %kid1 has your eyes. Sometimes we lock gazes and I find myself lost in them. I wonder what a child sees when looking upon one such as I.$3#$e#A father, I hope. And nothing less.$1 @@ This life... with you and our children...$4#$b#It's more than I ever thought I would have.$1#$e#Thank you, @, for choosing me.$6 @@ What do you think of asking Abigail to babysit?$0#$e#...Just a thought.$9 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Good_0: {{Random: Once I was a young man, foolish and restless and hungry for knowledge.#$b#I used to lament the loss of those days - it is an oft-stated tragedy that youth is wasted on the young - but I have come to realize that such days of vibrant energy are not lost to me.$1#$b#You have brought them back, @.$7#$e#You give me life anew, as I never expected to have.$1#$b#For this I can never repay you, but ever will I try.$1 @@ I still cannot believe that you chose to marry me...$6 @@ Ah, greetings, my heart! I was just thinking about you.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Good_1: {{Random: The dark dreams of my past are a fading memory. When I sleep at your side, not only do I sleep - an uncommon enough occurrence, once - but I sleep soundly.$1#$b#That is your doing. The calm of your soul soothes mine.$9#$e#When you are with me, I am invigorated.$1 @@ Not even in all of my forays into the future did I predict I could ever be so happy as you have made me.$6 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Good_3: {{Random: @.$6#$b#My @.$6#$b#How effortlessly you make me forget my flaws and past failures!$7#$b#When I see myself through your eyes, it is as if I have been reborn. That you could know all you know of me and still love me so is beyond even my comprehension.$1#$b#I am undeserving of such devotion, but nevertheless I thank you for it.$1#$e#Never will I fail you. I swear it.$6 @@ My love, you look simply radiant.$6 @@ I hope you're having a wonderful day, my love.$1|inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Good_4: {{Random: Have I expressed, lately, how I feel for you? If not, I have been remiss.$1#$b#My love for you overwhelms every other truth of my soul. Without you, I was a husk of a man, adrift in a world without meaning and lamenting my place in it.$6#$b#With you, I am as a slate wiped clean.#$e#I have no regrets, anymore.$6 @@ This... this is more home than ever my tower was. Or any place I dwelled before that.$1#$e#From now on, my home is with you. My heart.$6 @@ My tower is stocked with all kinds of rare books and reagents, and charms that I've collected from around the world that are nearly impossible to find.$0#$b#But none of it holds a candle to how precious you are to me.$6#$e#I realize that was a terrifically corny thing to say. But thankfully, you don't seem to mind.$9 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Good_5: {{Random: Any trace of that loneliness which once plagued me is banished by your presence. I had no idea how much I craved a contact outside the ethereal before our paths crossed.$6#$b#And now our souls are entwined as two trees grown together.$6#$e#It would take an axe to separate us.$6 @@ @... this wedding amulet it's flawless.$4#$b#You know I don't care for trinkets without practical use, but this...$4#$b#This is a symbol of us.$6#$e#It is more important than anything else I have ever owned.$6 @@ We should go on a little retreat together soon. I can pull some strings with the Guild to find us a place in a cozy little town in the mountains somewhere.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Good_6: {{Random: If you venture into the mines, beware, my heart.#$b#I have told you before of the evil that lurks there.$2#$b#I don't know what I would do if you fell prey...$8 @@ I love you for many reasons, but one is how talented you are. You're adept at anything you put your hand to.$0#$e#I admire you greatly for that.$4 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Good_7: {{Random: @. This house is a home because of all the work you do.$1#$b#Never let yourself believe I don't notice.$1 @@ Do you know, I don't think I've ever been so happy in all my life as I am with you, @.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Good_8: Sometimes, seeing all you do for us, I wonder how I survived before you married me.$3#$e#Then I remember I once subsisted an entire week on swamp moss and algae broth because my food delivery was delayed in a winter storm...$7
Entries.Good_9: This peace...$9#$b#This is what I always craved and never thought I would feel again.$4#$e#Thank you, @.$6
Entries.Neutral_0: {{Random: I hope you won't regret your decision to marry me when my hair turns grey and you are still quite young...$2 @@ Joy is a mysterious power. It must be protected, at all cost.$0 @@ Don't work too hard today. I don't want to have to levitate your limp body home.$2#$e#...If you unfortunately do pass out somewhere before I can find you... I trust Linus will take care of you.$0 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Neutral_1: {{Random: There are potent energies about your grandfather's shrine.$3#$b#Do you think he would be proud of how far you have come?$1#$e#I believe he is.$1 @@ Anger and hatred, they are false energies. Entries.Neutral_2: {{Random: Ah, @. Come for another lesson on the energies? I'm happy to oblige.$9#$e#It means more time with you.$1 @@ Using the energies comes at a cost. It's not free. Entries.Neutral_3: {{Random: I once thought I would live out the rest of my days locked away in that tower without even a single friend...$2#$e#You set that ambition on its nose$1#$b#Not that I'm complaining.$7 @@ I once saw a person try to keep a tree alive all year long, using powerful energies to do so.#$b#It was horrible: the tree itself wept, and begged to be freed. Entries.Neutral_4: {{Random: Hmm...? Yes, I'll pick up the pile of books as soon as I'm finished...$9 @@ If you go into town, make sure and say 'what's popping?' to everyone for me.$7 |inputSeparator=@@}}

Entries.Neutral_7: {{Random: Have you been practicing meditation, like I taught you?$9 @@ I need to make a trip to Castle Village soon to see Camilla to discuss some Ministry affairs. She's certainly an interesting woman.$0#$e#She approves of you, you know.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Neutral_8: {{Random: Hmm?$3#$b#Mess? No. I haven't noticed any.$11 @@ Let's go for a little walk soon. A change of scenery will surely do us good.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Neutral_9: If you find yourself obsessed with something you've never been interested before, it can mean you have been enchanted.$3#$b#Not all enchantments are bad, of course. Some can be quite positive. It is very mysterious.$1#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.$9
Entries.Bad_0: {{Random: You know I have been married once before and it went badly. Entries.Bad_1: {{Random: Black omens darken the horizons of our future.#$b#Will you heed the signs and change course, or will you continue as you have been?#$e#Do not make a choice you will later regret, @.$10 @@ ...I should never have married again.$11 @@ I may go spend some time in my tower... You've done nothing wrong. I just need some time to myself.$0 |inputSeparator=@@}}

Entries.Bad_3: {{Random: And so begins the fall beyond the summit... The descent will not be as joyous as the climb was, I fear.$10#$b#I wonder if we will catch our bearings before the landslide crumbles out of control...$2#$e#It pains me to look back and see how far we have fallen, already.$8 @@ Have I done something wrong...? It seems everything is falling apart, lately...$8 @@ ...Are you really happy with me?$2#$e#Sorry, I know it's not a fair question to ask. Never mind.$2 |inputSeparator=@@}}

Entries.Bad_5: {{Random: I should never have let you marry me.$10#$b#I seem only to make your life worse.$8 @@ I'm feeling quite out of sorts today. No, I don't think there's anything you can do to help.$0 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Bad_6: {{Random: We only have one short life to live... is this the best way to do it?$10 @@ I don't work as effectively on the farm as I do in my tower. Too many distractions.$0#$e#Ah, I... I apologize. I didn't mean for that to come off that way.$2 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Bad_7: {{Random: If there is anything I can do to fix this, please, tell me!$2#$b#I'm not ready to fail again as I have done in the past.$8 @@ My ex-wife flew over my tower last night and managed to burn some of the nearby trees to a crisp.$5#$e#That foolish woman could start a forest fire if she's not careful.$5 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Bad_8: {{Random: You have been so cold to me lately... @@ I'm not in the mood to talk today. It'll pass soon.$0 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Bad_9: If only I had been better for you...$8
Entries.funLeave_Wizard: {{Random: I require some things from my tower; if you seek me there, today, you will find me.#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.$7 @@ Off on some arcane errands. I'll return in time for dinner, I promise.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.funReturn_Wizard: {{Random: To return to this home we share is a relief. Never before had I thought of my tower as empty, and yet it feels that way without you there.$1#$e#I passed a productive day, nevertheless.#$b#Come, let us be together and share in each other's memories.$7 @@ What a wonderful place this is to return to.$1#$b#...Straight into your arms.$6 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.spring_1: {{Random: The energies have begun again. Spring is here, and the year is reborn.$9#$e#I feel renewed this year, not just because spring is the time for it, but because of my relationship with you, @.$6#$b#You have reminded me that I am still human. To focus on being human is a mystery itself that I almost forgot about.$9#$e#Thank you, @.$1 @@ You always know spring has arrived when you can hear the trees singing of new growth.$1#$e#Mmm? Yes, of course the trees sing. You can hear them too, just listen carefully.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.spring_2: I am always glad to wake beside you, @. I had predicted we would become friends, but I had no idea how far it would go.$1#$b#There are many mysteries in this world, and I am glad you chose me as one of yours.$6#$e#I count myself to be very lucky indeed.$7
Entries.spring_3: Many people are scared of me. The unknown causes them to tremble, and my association with it frightens them.#$b#You have continued to show you don't mind the mysterious. You embrace it, and take time out of your day to see me.$1#$b#Thank you, @. I thought I would be alone forever.$7#$e#You are a special person, indeed.$6
Entries.spring_5: I feel renewed this year, not just because spring is the time for it, but because of my relationship with you, @.$6#$b#You have reminded me that I am still human. To focus on being human is a mystery itself that I almost forgot about.$1#$e#Thank you, @.$1
Entries.spring_6: The air is electric, I feel this year will be a special one. Let us do our best to achieve our dreams, @.$1#$e#Do not give up. I will be with you.$1
Entries.spring_8: The greatest energies are the ones we allow ourselves to find. Everything else is false.$1#$b#Be true to what moves you, and you will be energized the rest of your life.$1#$e#That is my hope for you, @. Live forever!$7
Entries.spring_13: {{Random: What, exactly, is the purpose of hidden eggs?$3#$b#Is there some symbolism I don't comprehend?$3#$b#The eggs, perhaps, represent that which you need but do not desire, and so you seek because you must.$3#$e#No...?$3#$e#Of course I'm not going.#$b#I have quite enough mystery in my life without incomprehensible traditions.$1 @@ The day of the egg festival again, is it? Every year, I wonder what kind of ritual began the egg hunting tradition...$3#$e#I'm sure it was something quite ancient.$3 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.spring_23: The energies, at their core, are chaotic. Ever changing, they are denser than air yet more elusive than wind.$3#$b#In the end, many people believed it was not worth trying to solve the mystery, yet here I remain.$0#$e#Someday, @, I will truly understand.$1
Entries.summer_1: {{Random: Summer has come at last. The energies are at their most powerful. I'll get a lot of work done this season.$1#$b#Stay cool, @, and do not let the sun curse you.$9#$e#Maybe we'll go swimming this time...$4 @@ Summer has arrived! With all the plants lush and growing, you'll find it's much easier to draw mana from the world around you.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.summer_2: I still marvel that you would ever choose to be with one such as me. I am much too old and jaded for someone so full of life. And yet, here we are.$7#$e#You are the mystery I will never solve. Have an enchanted day, @.$1
Entries.summer_3: Ignorance is bliss. You've heard that saying before, I'm sure, but it's true. To know too much, it can turn one bitter.#$b#I still find hope in my studies, but some days, it is nearly too much to bear. Thank you for choosing me, @.$1#$e#You are what holds me to this reality.$1
Entries.summer_4: The focus on my life has always been on my studies now. Everything else fell away.#$b#Becoming close with you, though, has made me realize that maybe I should not be so consumed by the search for knowledge..$1#$b#There's more to life than reading the books about the lives of the dead.$9#$b#Now there is you.$6#$e#I am with you, @. I always will be.$6
Entries.summer_5: Using the energies comes at a cost. It's not free. To discuss all the different aspects would take ages.#3#$b#I'll tell you this though, @. My hair was not originally purple.#7#$e#That was a long time ago...$3
Entries.summer_8: There is a special energy in the air today. I can feel it, can you?$1#$b#It is the energy of our love! It is invigorating. It makes me feel young again.$1#$e#Is that weird? I don't get out much, @.$9
Entries.summer_11: {{Random: I have no interest in this governor, nor in the pomp and ceremony designed to impress him.#$b#But I will attend the festival.$1#$e#The activity on the beach draws out curious merfolk.$3#$b#It provides me a unique opportunity to converse with them.$1 @@ It's the luau today, yes? I'm sure whatever the town comes up with will be as peculiar as usual.$3 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.summer_15: One can get so caught up in work that life just falls away. Others retreat to their work because they cannot handle their life.#$b#I'm realizing lately that I've done a lot of things that I wasn't happy with. Forced myself to do what was wrong for what I thought was right.$2#$b#I hope to someday get forgiveness, @.$0#$e#Someday.$1
Entries.summer_28: {{Random: The season of the Lunaloos is upon us.$9#$b#Of all the peculiar things people in this town choose to celebrate, this is the one I can understand.$1#$e#I would prefer to avoid the crowds on the docks, however.#$b#I'm sure you'll find me, regardless.$1#$b#You always do.$7 @@ The lunaloos are visiting us today. We understand very little about them, but...$0#$b#They certainly have more mystical powers than any of the other sea creatures we've studied.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.fall_1: {{Random: Can you feel the changes in the air? I don't just mean in the temperature. The trees, they are giving off a unique energy.#$e#May this fall be an enchanted one.$1 @@ Mushrooms are abundant in the fall. They're very versatile for potionmaking!$1#$e#If you do any foraging this season, I'd be happy to take some off your hands.$9 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.fall_2: Studying and using the energies can make one very tired, @. All these years of it has brought me to the brink.#$b#Yet it is my curiosity that drives me. I don't have all the answers, and there are still questions I have.$3#$b#Like you, @. What continues to bring you back to me, time and again?$7#$e#Perhaps someday I will understand you.$1#$b#Then again, I enjoy the mystery.$9
Entries.fall_3: There have been times when I have had the chance to wield unlimited energy. Many would be tempted by such power.$3#$b#I am only human. I was lucky to reject them, for it would have destroyed me.#$b#All that glimmers is not always good, @.#$e#Who knows what I would have become? A scary thought.$2
Entries.fall_4: Am I a better person than I was before all this? In all my searching, have I been able to find a way to become stronger?$3#$b#I have answers to many mysteries, but they haven't changed me. They are only answers. Have I done all I can?$2#$e#I have thought about these things for a long time. My own mystery.$3
Entries.fall_8: It is difficult to remember what it is to have normal conversations. When conversing with the energies, one must speak a unique and complex language.#$b#To talk human is to ask how another is, and to do that with meaning is hard for me. Luckily, I can practice on you.$1#$e#What's up, dog? No? Is that not a saying?$3
Entries.fall_15: Words can't express how grateful I am for you, @. It is nice to be able to talk with someone about all the aspects of my work.$1#$e#...Amongst other things.$4
Entries.fall_16: {{Random: My old friend Welwick has come to town for the fair.$1#$b#Her divination skills outshine even mine.$9 @@ I hope you've prepared a showcase for the fair that accurately represents your considerable talents.$1#$e#%Magnus smiles at me. |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.fall_25: I have been focusing my energies lately to find the answer to this question: how is it that when I'm out and about I'm tired, but when I try to sleep, I cannot?$3#$b#It is a grand mystery, @. Someday I will solve it.$2#$e#Until then, I count on your soothing presence to lull me to sleep each night.$6
Entries.fall_26: I will be making another maze for the festival, tonight.$1#$e#It's the only time of year I can contrive such a simple way for the elementals to observe the affairs of mundane folk so closely.$9
Entries.fall_27: I have important business with the town maze today! Lots of mana required, and the work takes a great deal out of me.$0#$e#I hope you and the rest of the townsfolk enjoy it. ...And I apologize if I have to lean on you on the walk home.$1
Entries.fall_28: I sense a strong winter storm brewing...$0
Entries.winter_1: {{Random: It is a time for peace and study. The snow fall has made me weak, and I will rest.#$e#I hope this will be a special winter for us, @.$1 @@ Quite a storm, wasn't it? But the world looks lovely blanketed in snow, even if the weather is harsh.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.winter_2: I wish I could reveal my true name to you, @. In truth, I just don't remember it.$1#$b#Was it Carl? Or Hank? Maybe John?$3#$b#I think it was a good name. It's hard to know.$3#$e#Maybe it was @! Imagine that?$1
Entries.winter_4: My name is...I still don't remember.$3#$b#Yes, Magnus Rasmodius is not, in fact, my real name.$3#$b#I made it as an alias upon beginning my magic practice, but with time, eventually I and everyone around me forgot my original name.#$b#What is it, do you not like Rasmodius? We're you planning on taking it?$1
Entries.winter_6: All in all, remember this, @: the only energy you truly need is your own.$1#$b#Use that logic, and seize the day. Let nothing stop you!$7#$e#Unless it's not a good idea, in which case, don't do it.$10
Entries.winter_7: There is a great feeling in our relationship. I hope someday to be able to be as natural as I am with you with the whole village.$7#$b#They still fear but, someday, hopefully, they'll give me a chance. You have.$1#$e#That's made all the difference.$9
Entries.winter_8: {{Random: Hmm...? The festival?#$b#I have no interest in fish or ice sculptures.#$b#And you know full well I'm no good at socialization.$11#$e#I think I will visit my tower, instead.$1#$b#In spite of the weak ambient energy this time of year, I believe I can muster the strength to occupy myself.$9 @@ I presume you'll be ice fishing at the festival today? Best of luck, @.$1#$e#There's a spot in the forest with arcane potential I'll be assessing. You're welcome to join me when you're finished putting Willy in his place.$7 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.winter_12: The Night Market is coming up in just a few days. I typically don't bother with such shallow affairs, but I've picked up some rare ingredients in the past there that have come in quite handy.$3
Entries.winter_15: Night Market?#$b#Bah! I have little time for such frivolous affairs.$3#$b#Not even the merfolk would bother with that light parade.$3#$e#By all means, enjoy yourself.$1#$b#It's just not for me.$9
Entries.winter_17: Happy... Birthday...?$3#$b#...Don't tell me I've forgotten your birthday.$10#$b#It's... mine? Ah, I guess it is.$3#$b#We don't have to do anything, my love. Spending time with you already makes me happier than you could ever imagine.$1#$e#If you really insist on celebrating, perhaps we could go to the Night Market tonight?$1#$b#I know I called it frivolous earlier, but it's a good excuse to get out of the house, no?$9
Entries.winter_25: All those people gather together to feast over the supposed good fortune of the Winter Star, and it isn't even a star.$3#$b#Not that anyone - excepting you, of course - would listen if I tried to tell them that, in the deep of winter, even an untrained eye can see the glimmer of of the astral plane.$1#$e#I do support a celebration of the waxing energies. But I don't support this ignorance.$3#$b#I will, of course, attend if you wish me to. But only for you, my love.$9
Entries.winter_28: What a year it has been. I'm glad we have grown so close, @. It would have been very boring without you.$6#$b#Just me and the Shrine of Illusion, making faces at each other.$1#$e#I still make faces at the Shrine. I'm not sure it appreciates it.$7
Entries.spouseRoom_Wizard: {{Random: Strange Basilisks... Fundamentals Of Goblins... Unicorns of Timor-Leste...$3#$e#No, no, that's not it...$0#$e#Where did I leave that book...?$3 @@ Mmm...I don't wish to take the farmhouse over completely, but I do wish I had a few more of my spellbooks here to consult.$3 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.patio_Wizard: {{Random: ...Hmm? It's a ritual circle.$3#$e#You remember. From our lessons.$1 @@ A pleasant day to be out and about. Care to join me?$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}

Entries.fall_Wizard: {{Random: Wind blows swiftly between the elemental planes. Can you hear them whispering, as they pass us by?$3#$b#Shh! Listen.$1#$e#You make an adept young wizard, for a farmer.$7 @@ Enchantments, energies, and experiments. Though their powers are great and can do many things, they can't solve all of life's problems.#$b#They cannot, for example, make someone fall in love with another and have it be an honest relationship. It never ends well.$3 @@ The time for harvest has arrived. I hope ours are bountiful this year.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}

{{Random: Wind blows swiftly between the elemental planes. Can you hear them whispering, as they pass us by?$3#$b#Shh! Entries.spring_24: ...You want me to attend the Flower Dance?$3#$b#I think not. Such frivolous displays are beyond me.#$b#Besides, I'm much too old to dance.$1#$b#You'll just have to enjoy yourself without me.$9#$e#...#$b#Please don't dance with anyone else.$4
Entries.Good_2: {{Random: Before we wed, I considered my life more or less at an end.#$b#I would toil on through the land of the living for some untold number of decades, in all likelihood, but it was as a flat ground at the bottom of a slope. Already I had climbed the mountain and come down the other side.#$b#I thought I should see no more mountains, in my time. And yet, here we are.$1#$e#You give my life new purpose, @.$1 @@ You know... I fell for you long before you gave me that bouquet.$4#$e#I never said a word.$4#$b#I thought you could never love an old man like me.$9 @@ With all the heartache in my past, I never thought I'd wake up to days as sweet as these...$0#$e#Thank you for giving an aloof old wizard a chance.$4 |inputSeparator=@@}}

Entries.spring_24: ...You want me to attend the Flower Dance?$3#$b#I think not. Such frivolous displays are beyond me.#$b#Besides, I'm much too untrained to dance.$1#$b#You'll just have to enjoy yourself without me.$9#$e#...#$b#Please don't dance with anyone else.$4

Entries.NewChild_Adoption: A family of our own... I never would have imagined.$6
Entries.NewChild_FirstChild: I have spent so long dreaming of this moment, yet nothing could hold a candle to reality.$6
Entries.NewChild_SecondChild1: You've made me the happiest man alive. Twice.$6
Entries.NewChild_SecondChild2: Never did I foresee two beautiful children with the love of my life... This is what I was missing.$6

Entries.Wizard: Stormy days are the only time I can commune with certain elementals. It is a delicate business.#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.$1

He needs it for some kind of dark magic./Bring Wizard a Void Essence./Wizard 769/-1/1000/-1/true/Ah, you've brought it. You have earned my gratitude. Please, take this in return. Coin means little to me.$1
Entries.123: ItemDelivery/Staff Of Power/The Wizard is creating a staff of phenomenal power. Who knows what it's for. He needs an iridium bar to finish it./Bring Wizard an Iridium Bar./Wizard 337/-1/5000/-1/true/Ah, precious iridium. You've done well, @. You have my eternal thanks.$1

Entries.Game1.cs.2782: That celebration was... overmuch. I'm am unused to being the center of such a crowd. $9#$e#I much prefer to be alone here with you.$6
Entries.NPC.cs.3962: Ah! Is this...? For me...?$1#$b#Of course I feel the same!$7#$e#My heartbeat is fierce. How is yours?$6
Entries.NPC.cs.3963: Ah! Is this...? For me...?$1#$b#Of course I feel the same!$7#$e#My heartbeat is fierce. How is yours?$6
Entries.NPC.cs.3980: ...!!!$1#$b#@...!$6#$b#You truly wish to marry me?$6#$b#If that is true - somehow, impossibly true - then yes! Unequivocally, yes!!$6#$b#I will see to all the arrangements. Give me but three days, my love.$9

Entries.NPC.cs.4001: My heart, this fruit is for you. It has potent arcane energies to enhance your own.$4#$e#Let it be a symbol of my love.$4
Entries.NPC.cs.4406: Cannot... get... up...$10#$e#Perhaps I expended too much energy yesterday.$11
Entries.NPC.cs.4422: I feel a dark mood encroaches.$10#$b#What have I done with my life to this point? Will I ever find what I first sought, or will I waste away in obscurity and failure?$2
Entries.NPC.cs.4423: Ith akular...#$b# Ith soth...#$b#Ith igira kair...#$e#Hmm...? I am fine. Merely distracted - I must finish this...$3
Entries.NPC.cs.4424: I am drained. The energies are tremulous about me.$10#$e#Perhaps I should not have completed that second gate, yesterday...$11
Entries.NPC.cs.4425: Life has changed since we were wed...
Entries.NPC.cs.4426: I have no time for the trivialities of housekeeping.#$b#See to them, yourself, if it bothers you.
Entries.NPC.cs.4431: ...$2#$b#I feel... constrained in this place.$2#$ePerhaps I should take some time away.$11
Entries.NPC.cs.4432: The energies grow darker by the day...$10
Entries.NPC.cs.4433: I have a great deal on my mind.#$e#I would prefer not to be disturbed.
Entries.NPC.cs.4434: Nghh... It is far too early to be up and about.$10#$b#For you, as well. Get back here.$6#$e#Of course I didn't stay up all night. Only until two.$4
Entries.NPC.cs.4435: Come back to bed. It's warmer in here.$6#$e#Where are you going? Come back here and enable my lethargy!$9
Entries.NPC.cs.4436: Are you sure you wouldn't rather just stay here, today?$3#$e#We could stay in bed and only pretend we had been productive.$4
Entries.NPC.cs.4437: Where are you going? I haven't finished sleeping, yet.$3#$e#You know I can't sleep after you rise.$4
Entries.NPC.cs.4438: Nnnghh...$10#$b#The nightmares have returned.$11#$e#Stay with me.$4
Entries.NPC.cs.4439: Much as I am eager to be a father, I cannot help but be apprehensive about the changes a child will bring to our lives...$2#$e#Swear to me that whatever comes, we will make the changes for the better.$1
Entries.NPC.cs.4444: {0}. Our child will arrive soon. Even speaking these words aloud, I can hardly believe it.$6
Entries.NPC.cs.4447: {0}. Our child will arrive soon. Even speaking these words aloud, I can hardly believe it.$6
Entries.NPC.cs.4448: {0}, I can sense the shift of the energies around you. You are pregnant!$7
Entries.NPC.cs.4452: @. If I don't get a moment to myself I may strangle someone.$10#$e#Please. Just deal with the children, today.410
Entries.NPC.cs.4462: I arose early to tend to the crops. I hope it will ease the burden on you.$1#$b# Be at peace, my love.$1
Entries.NPC.cs.4470: I arose early to tend the crops for you, and found the work already done! You are a marvel, {0}.$7
Entries.NPC.cs.4474: I arose early to tend to the animals. I hope it will ease the burden on you.$1#$b# Have an enchanted day, my love.$9
Entries.NPC.cs.4481: I have expended some energy making repairs to your fences. With any luck, they will not spontaneously combust until the rains come.$1
Entries.NPC.cs.4488: Ah! At last, my special deliver has arrived!$1
Entries.NPC.cs.4489: Do you ever find this space too drab in the absence of a massive cauldron?$3

Entries.NPC.cs.4429: Sometimes I catch sight of myself in the mirror and wonder what you saw in this old face.$2#$e#Do you see it, still?$10
Entries.NPC.cs.4427: You look at me and see an old man, don't you?#$e#It is what I am...$2

Entries.NPC.cs.4429: Sometimes I catch sight of myself in the mirror and wonder what you saw in this dull face.$2#$e#Do you see it, still?$10

Entries.MovieInvite_Invited_Wizard: Ah, yes. Movies. A modern invention with which I am most certainly familiar. Yes. *Ahem* I would be glad to go. I shall meet you there.
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Wizard: There is nothing I would rather do than spend time in your company, my love, movie or no.$6#$e#I would be delighted. I will see you there shortly.$9

Entries.NPC.cs.4274: ...My birthday? Oh, it's that silly day again. Thank you nonetheless.$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4275: A gift? For my birthday? My, these are potent materials indeed, thank you.$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4276: For me? A birthday gift? Truly, I forgot my birthday today. Thank you.$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4277: Seems you have a better memory than me. Thank you for the gift.$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4278: What's the purpose of this? Oh? Well... thank you.
Entries.NPC.cs.4279: A birthday gift? You didn't have to...really...$u
Entries.NPC.cs.4281: Oh? A birthday gift? I really appreciate it, thank you.$h

Entries.fall_26.000: I'm helping prepare for tomorrow's festivities.$9
Entries.fall_26.003: There is much yet to be done to connect this plane to the other.$1
Entries.fall_26.004: %The Wizard is too deep in concentration to take notice of you.
Entries.fall_26.006: This task taxes me. I will need to rest soon.$10
Entries.winter.000: Sleep calls and yet refuses to take me.$10
Entries.spring.000: Even I need fresh air sometimes.$1
Entries.marriage_Thu.000: My heart.$1#$b#My tower seems empty compared to our home.$1#$b#But I cannot deny the benefits of working here, at times.$3
Entries.marriage_Thu.001: Ah, @. Have you come to check on me?$1#$b#I'll be home, soon. Just after I finish one... last... thing...$3#$b#...$3#$b#What time is it?$10#$b#...I may have forgotten to eat lunch.$11
Entries.marriage_winter_17.000: Ah, @. Have you met Iona?$1#$b#She's an excellent alchemist who travels the world alongside this crew and has seen many a thing or two.$3#$b#Just now she was describing her most recent expedition to the far north.$3
Entries.marriage_winter_17.001: This is an impressive collection... Some of these trinkets could prove to be exceptionally useful for my rituals...#$b#How about you, my heart? Anything catch your eye?$1
Entries.marriage_winter_17.002: Hmm?$3#$b#I'm just enjoying the view, would you like to join me?$1#$e#I'm... deeply grateful to have you in my life.#$b#You are no doubt tired of hearing it so much, I know. But I don't wish to ever take you for granted, not even for a second.#$b#I love you very much, @, never forget.$1#$e#I'll go home shortly, don't worry. I just... want to take in the moment for a while.$1
Entries.marriageExpecting_winter_17.002: Hmm?$3#$b#I'm just enjoying the view, would you like to join me?$1#$e#I'm... deeply grateful to have you, and our future child, in my life.#$b#You are no doubt tired of hearing it so much, I know. But I don't wish to ever take you for granted, not even for a second.#$b#I love you very much, @, never forget.$1#$e#I'll go home shortly, don't worry. I just... want to take in the moment for a while.$1
Entries.NightMarket.000: Greetings, @.#$b# I take it you're enjoying the night?#$b#I don't personally enjoy the market, but a wizard needs his stocks replenished too.$1
Entries.NightMarket.002: The Night Market is good not only for trade of material goods, but knowledge as well.$1
Entries.NightMarket.003: The merchandise is fully authentic don't you worry.#$b#That is, most of it at least.$1
Entries.NightMarket.004: The Night Market is a rather new occasion in Pelican Town. It's a consequence of the war, many merchants are becoming more destitute and desperate by the day.#$b#I hope knowing that didn't spoil the mood for you.$2
Entries.NightMarket.005: It's a good place for your holiday shopping.$1
Entries.NightMarket.006: It's lovely to see you, @.$1#$b#May I ask we spend the Night Market together? Only if you don't mind, of course.$1#$b#Whats the proper term...$3#$b#...ehm...a date?$3
Entries.NightMarket.007: Some of the merchandise on sale is quite potent. If used correctly it can be of great assistance to your farm.$3#$b#I can help you set it up if you decide to purchase any.$1
Entries.NightMarket.008: Despite all the buzz of the night, the only thing I can think about is you and our upcoming wedding.$6
Entries.NightMarket.009: I saw some gorgeous flowers in one of the stalls earlier. Perhaps we can purchase some for the occasion?$3
Entries.NightMarket.010: I don't wish to speak with you today.
Entries.marriage.000: Here for a visit? You are welcome here, as always. My apologies if I'm a little distracted.$1
Entries.marriage.001: If you wait just a moment, I'll let you take a taste of the potion I am working on! Nothing dangerous, I promise you.$9#$b#We're trying to perfect a recipe that provides long-lasting night vision.$1
Entries.marriage.002: Oh, what a nice surprise! And good timing. I was about to disappear into a pile of books.$3
Entries.marriage.003: You're the most welcome distraction I've had all day.$1#$b#Lewis makes some very strange requests sometimes...$10
Entries.marriage.004: Ah, hello, @! You're welcome to stay while I work. I find your presence calming.$1
Entries.marriage.005: It's always a pleasant surprise when you come to visit me at my tower. I trust your day is going well.$1
Entries.marriage.006: I'm taking a break from teaching Morgan the next set of spells at the minute.$0#$b#They're performing very well in their lessons, but teaching magic wears me out a little.$0
Entries.marriage.007: Today, I'm teaching Morgan a number of different spells to transform one kind of fruit into a different kind.$0#$b#We're both more than a little hungry.$3
Entries.marriage.008: I have to keep reminding myself that Morgan is young. They have tremendous potential, but they need some time to grow into it.$0
Entries.marriage.009: It's been a long few days collecting mushrooms in the forest, but Morgan and I finally get to do some experimenting with new potion recipes today.$1
Entries.marriage.010: Morgan's potionmaking skills are coming along nicely. They mixed up an elixir of healing earlier that was just as good as anything I can produce.$1
Entries.marriage.011: Today, Morgan and I are brewing a potion of luck. Hopefully they don't make the same mistake they did last time.$3#$b#They spent a week tripping over every branch in the forest, and I broke *two* of my favorite mirrors.$10
Entries.marriage.012: Ah, I'm glad you stopped by! I wanted to let you know I might run late tonight.$3#$b#Today, Morgan and I have to take a trip deeper into the forest than usual for one of our lessons.$0
Entries.marriage.013: Morgan and I are assessing the wards in the forest west of here today.$0
Entries.marriage.014: I am just finishing up here, @! I'm looking forward to spending the evening with you.$1
Entries.marriage.015: Just one more attempt at finishing this potion before I give up. At least it hasn't actually *exploded* yet.$10
Entries.marriage.016: I will be home soon, I promise. I need to clean up a little around here first.#$b#I'm afraid that the more exciting magical research becomes, the more of a mess it makes.$1
Entries.marriage.017: I do wish Camilla would call me by my name, instead of 'Razzy.' ...No, don't you dare.$10
Entries.marriage.018: I haven't looked outside yet, but I hope Camilla took more care with where she landed this time.$0#$b#Last time I lost my favorite blackberry bush.$2

Entries.Spouseroom.12: The shelves are filled with dusty tomes: "Advanced History Of Caring For Pixies", "Pixie Watching In The West", "A Practical History Of Caring For Unicorns"...
Entries.Spouseroom.13: Leatherbound books have titles nearly worn away: "1000 Magical Stones", "1001 Mystical Plants", "A Child's Companion To Fantastic Fungi"...
Entries.Spouseroom.14: Among the cryptic titles, you can make out a few: "Wonderful Librium of Hallowed Lunisolar Magic", "Eldritch Whispering", "Tablets Obscene"...
Entries.Spouseroom.15: You're positive these candles have been burning ever since he moved in. They never seem to get any smaller.
Entries.Spouseroom.16: Whatever's in here, it smells like boiled grass.

Entries.Wizard: Have a care not to miss any.#$b#The smell of rotting eggs attracts basilisks.$3
Last year the townsfolk neglected to care for some left behind eggs.#$b#Had it not been for me, the basilisks would've wrought havoc upon Pelican Town.

This ritual of egg-hunting makes little sense to me.#$b#Yet every year I come and marvel at the the bizarre excuses mundane folk concoct for an excuse to celebrate.$3#$e#Can't you just have a festival for the sake of it?$3#$b#No one is fooled.$0
Such senseless activity with such senseless results.#$b#Why hasn't this painful tradition, with such agonizing cleanup, faded over the generations already?
The egg, perhaps, symbolizes a rebirth.$3#$b#In spring, all things are born anew, are they not.$3#$e...$0#$e#I'm overthinking this, aren't I?$10

Perhaps, it is not the egg that drives their motivation to pursue this strange tradition.$3#$b#The egg hunt is specifically designed with children in mind, is it not? Therefore they must be connected...$3#b#Children do begin as eggs...$3#b#I'm afraid I still don't understand these bizarre festivities.$10

@.#$b#This is very important, so I need you to listen very closely and consider your answer carefully.$1#$b...$1#$b#What is the purpose of the egg hunt?!$10#$e#Surely, you can share the secret with me.$10

If I were to procure all the iridium ore you may need to last the rest of spring, would that entice you enough to explain this festival to me?$9#$b#No?$1#$b#How about as many kisses as I may possibly muster after the festival?$7#$b#Still no?$1#$b#My, you're difficult to please aren't you.$7#$e#Perhaps it is true, the mystery of the egg festival is destined to forever elude me.$1
Yes, I did say I was not going to attend.#$b#...#$b#And yet, here we are.$3#$e#I can't stop myself!$11#$b#Why do they hunt eggs?!$10#$e#I won't be able to sleep tonight unless I find the answer.$11

Regardless how much I swear to abstain from the Egg Festival, it always drags me back in. It's as if the egg itself is placing me in a trance...$3$#b#Perhaps it's finally driven me mad.$10#$b#@. You have to help me.$10#$b#Why must it be eggs??$11
%Magnus looks lost in thought.
I can't work with such a commotion happening out here.
I'm waiting for them to disperse to begin with a ritual.
Each year I watch from afar and I still do not understand these customs.
I'm afraid this event makes as little sense to me as the previous.
They do look very happy.$2#$b#...Maybe next year I will join in.$1
Their happiness radiates into the surrounding elementals. You can sense it even from here.$3#$b#...$2

Ah. So you've found me.$1#$b#And here I thought I was being covert.$1#$e#Dance...?$3#$b#Ah...$4#$b#I... do not think that would be wise.$4#$b#I don't know the steps.$3#$e#I apologize if I've disappointed you...$4

@?$3#$b#What am I doing here?$3#$b#Studying I presume.$1#$b#Courting you has made me more curious of the other townsfolk. I wish to understand them better.$1#$b#Is it going well?$3#$b#Ah... well...$11
...$3#$b#...Yes, alright, I came.$10#$b#It isn't because I don't trust you.$11#$b#I only wanted to learn how to make you happier.$9#$e#I wish I could dance with you.$6#$b#But I can't go down there.$4

...Greetings, my love.$9#$b#...$9#$b#I must apologize. I said I wouldn't come but here I am...$2#$b#I thought further about what I had said this morning... and I remembered how much these festivities mean to you.$2#$b#So I came. Hoping to understand this festival, and by extension you, some more.$1#$e#Please forgive me, @.
Does speaking to me today, of all days, entertain you? You have a sick sense of humor.#$e#Leave.$5
You would do well to study the merpeople in these parts.#$e#You can learn a great deal from opening your eyes to lifeforms outside of your own.
If only the townsfolk new who's watching, perhaps they'd be more respectful of their surroundings.#$b#The merpeople have long lasting memories.
If you wish to do the merpeople a service, you'll stay after and make sure those townsfolk take away all the garbage they have brought along.
The merpeople are often shackled with cleaning up after human beach activity.#$b#The Luau is the most infamous and dreadful day in their clans.
I wouldn't try that soup, if I were you.$3#$b#You haven't been standing here watching what they've put in.$3#$e#Aren't there rules for this sort of thing?$11

Are you participating in the communal soup this year?#$b#Seeing what nonsense gets placed in it year after year, it almost rivals my own cauldron.$7#$b#You're the only hope that soup has, @. Please save Pelican Town from food poisoning.$1
@. Thank you for coming to talk to me.$7#$b#The merfolk are good company, but I still prefer yours.$4#$e#How would you like to learn their language?$7#$b#I can teach you some, now.$1

It's good to see you, @.$1#$b#The merfolk were just asking about you. I promise I said only good things.$7#$b#Would you like to meet them when you have the time? I think you would find them quite interesting.$3

The common folk are always telling tales of the beauty of merfolk.$1#$b#I have never found them so.$3#$b#Interesting, certainly, but not beautiful.$9#$e#Perhaps because you show me true beauty every day.$6

The ocean is...nice.#$b#We should come here more often, just the two of us.$1#$b#If we do, I can tell the merfolk to leave us be and we can have the further half of the beach all to ourselves.$4#$b#What do you think?$6
I'm busy. Find entertainment elsewhere.
I can feel the building energy in the night.#$b#Very soon, now.$1#$e#Mind that you pay close attention.$1
The Lunaloos carry with them an aura of sorts. With their unique atmosphere, they create a truly unforgettable night.$1#$b#Don't let it slip by.
You have a keen mind, @.#$b#If you focus, I'm certain you will be able to sense the arcane energies that the Lunaloos project.$1#$e#Sharpen your mind. Enjoy the night, @.$9

You must have noticed the changes in the air already. It certainly makes the night feel spectacular, don't you think?$1#$b#Don't get caught up with the energies though, the Lunaloos are a sight to behold.$9#$b#I hope you enjoy yourself tonight, @.$1
You'll miss the Lunaloos if you spend all your time lurking in the shadows.$1#$e#What do you mean what about me?$3
Aren't you cold, @?#$b#You should warm up by the cabin if you are. It's getting quite chilly here by the woods.#$e#Hm?$3#$b#Don't worry about me, I have my cloak to keep warm.$1
I can sense them well enough from over here, thank you.#$b#There are too many people on the docks.$3#$e#I wouldn't say no to your company, however.$7
I'd rather not come over. In such darkness, I may unnerve them even further.#$b#...#$b#You look stunning when the shadows grace your face like that though.$1
My heart.$1#$b#Sit with me. Clear your mind and feel the energies flow around you.$7#$e#Can you sense them?$1

May I compare thee to a Lunaloos glow?$1#$b#What?$3#$b#Perhaps I may have read some of the books in your collection, yes.$9#$b#Is it a crime for me to spend the festival praising the main attraction of the night?$6
%Magnus is averting your gaze.
You would do well to listen to Welwick's divination.#$b#Her senses are sharply attuned to the future.$3#$e#Incidentally, I would avoid that clown, were I you.$11

Welwick can divinate much further beyond merely relationships.#$b#For example, she can foretell what items your fellow farmers will bring to next year's fair.$1#$e#As for the clown? Well...$3#$b#I am afraid I don't have as many positive impressions.

That clown is back.$11#$b#Every time I see him it sparks something uncomfortable in me, yet I still can't place him.$10#$e#Somehow I feel as if he is taunting me.$10#$b#But he hasn't looked this direction even once.$11

That clown is at the peak of his career with the indistinguishable farce hes maintaining. I fear he may the beginning of many children's coulrophobia.$10#$b#I swear on my entire tome collection, I've seen his wry face someplace before...$11#$e#In a nightmare...?$11

That's it!!$1#$b#It was the School of Illusion!$1#$b#Without a doubt, that is Ixeor the Mad!$1#$b#He dropped out before completing the program. I daresay we all thought he had gone properly mad.$3#$b#Maybe he has.$11#$e#Better that you give him a wide berth, @.

Greetings, @.$1#$b#Are you entering the grange display again? Your crops are bursting with vitality this year, you'd rank high I'm sure.$9#$e#No, I did not consult with Welwick for that prediction. It is solely my own.$7

Have I introduced you to Welwick, @?$1#$b#There are certainly cons in this field, but I assure you, she is not one of them$9b#Her grasp of the unknown is admirable.$1#$e#Hmm? You aren't jealous are you?$3#$b#She's only a friend.$7

Have I ever counseled with Welwick myself?$3#$b#I've never felt it necessary. I'm capable of divination myself, albeit not as extensively as Welwick.#$b#Furthermore, divination is indefinite at best, and dangerous at worst.#$b# There is a time and place for it, but somethings are certainly worth left unspoiled. Otherwise where's the enjoyment in living?$1#$e#Let's just say I have my own hopes for the future, and I don't wish to be let down or assured.$1

@, you remember my friend Welwick, I'm certain.$1#$b#We must invite her over for dinner, once this is through.$9#$e#...ah... you wouldn't mind cooking, would you?$4#$b#You know how reliable I am in the kitchen...$10

You worked tirelessly for your grange display this year, @. We should celebrate it once we return home.$1#$b#I cannot promise to prepare a delicious meal, but perhaps we can ask to bring extra food home from...$9#$b#...Gus? ...Is that the man's name?$3#$e#It has been difficult memorizing the names of people you have been, until now, fervently avoiding.$9
The lineup for Welwick is that way.
It never ceases to amaze me how tied up in this maze some people become.$3#$e#Why can they not see through the temptations and horrors?$3

With the approach of winter, using this much mana has exhausted me beyond normal.#$b#But I enjoy contributing to Pelican Town in this manner. No socialization required, just arcane magic and creativity.$7#$b#Not to mention, it's good exercise too.$1
This maze may be a worthwhile place for you to hone your skills, my heart.$7#$b#If you focus, you should be able to commune with at least one of these elementals.$1#$e#Try.$7#$b#Reach out and...$9

There is increased elemental activity this year once again. We could take the opportunity to train you further if you'd like.$3#$b#While I'm confident you're adept enough to handle the task on your own, if you ever require assistance while in the maze do not be afraid to speak my name, I'll promptly come.$1#$b#Two great minds are always better than one.$7#$e#Besides, being together in the deep depths of a maze alone... doesn't sound that foul.$4

Did you see the elementals, @?$1#$b#They certainly saw you.$9#$e#You are often inquired about, and never do I have a coherent explanation.$7#$b#Now perhaps some of them will understand what you are.$1#$b#Perfection.$6

You still create quite the hubbub among the elementals this time of year.$1#$b#What can I say? You're extraordinary.$9#$b#The elementals circulating you should consider themselves blessed to be allowed in your presence.$1#$b#Perhaps they might smite me for saying such contentious things, but what husband would I be if I said otherwise.$3#$e#If even the elementals are blessed, then I'm truly the luckiest man in the world.$6
The elementals still ask about you every year...$2#$e#If the elementals wont give me a break, then can at least you leave me alone.$10
Surely you have more interesting things to do.
It is easy to get lost in these woods. You should go.
The festival noise makes working impossible.$5#$b#I'll be relieved when they leave.$10
I hope I won't have to save any fallen children from those openings in the ice this year.$10
I prefer to watch from afar, rather than engage.$3#$e#It's probably best for all of us, that way.$0

Did you know Linus is exceptional in igloo construction?$1#$b#He's a well traveled man with an immense amount of practical knowledge. I've known him for some time now and still the breadth of his skills surprise me.$9#$e#Would you like to go greet him with me?$1
Are you enjoying yourself?$1#$e#I'll remain up here, if it's all the same to you.$9#$b#You remember what happened last time I tried to talk to a normal person.$10

How are you, @? Are you keeping warm?#$b#I can offer you my cape if you'd like, it's magically reinforced and surprisingly insulating.$1#$b#Or I can prepare you a warming concoction if thats more to your liking?$3#$e#What, still distrusting my potions from when we first met?$1#$b#I promise I'll try to make it palatable this time.$7
I can't say I understand the purpose of all this, but it only matters than you enjoy yourself.$9#$e#Are you?$1

Good luck in the fishing competition, my heart.$1#$e#... Join?$3#$b#... Fishing... in front of the whole town...$11#$b#Ah... I would much rather join the fish.$10#$b#I apologize if that disappoints you, my love. I will be supporting you from the sidelines, I promise.$10
%Magnus is beginning teleportation.
I have taken the liberty of setting up this space just for the two of us, away from the main bustle of festivities. I hope you don't mind.$4#$e#Linus was just keeping me company.$1

Merry Waxing Energies, my heart.$9#$b#...If I'm not mistaken this is a festival for gift-giving, am I correct?$3#$b#...Give me your hands...here.$4[337 517 72]#$b#I love you, @. This gift doesn't represent even a fraction of how much I do.$6#$e#Well now, what do you say to a good meal?$7

Entries.Wizard_wizardNap: Greetings @,^^I must apologize for the state in which you found me the other day. On occasion I find my sleep plagued with dark dreams and I, childishly, resort to avoiding my bed. It shames me to know you witnessed such behavior from me. Nevertheless, I would like to thank you for choosing to stay with me. With you nearby I slept soundly as I have not for several weeks.^If I can ever repay you, you have but to ask.^^ Sincerely,^ Magnus
Entries.Wizard_teachMagic: Greetings @,^^Many untold wonders are sheltered amongst the trees. Today, in particular, a strange energy stirs in the forest.^If you would like to learn heretofore unknown secrets, meet me in the hidden woods north of my tower.^^ Sincerely,^ Magnus

Entries.3073001/f Wizard 500/t 600 2300: WizardSong/-1000 -1000/farmer 9 24 0 Wizard 10 15 2/skippable/viewport 8 18 true/move farmer 0 -3 0/pause 2000/speak Wizard "Ah, @. I foresaw your coming, today. Please, join me."/pause 800/move Wizard -2 0 3/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 300/move farmer 0 -2 0/pause 1500/speak Wizard "$q -1 null#How goes your quest with the Juminos, hm?$3#$r -1 20 event_quest1#It's going great!#$r -1 -20 event_quest2#Huh?#$r -1 0 event_quest3#Uh... it's... going."/pause 500/move Wizard 0 2 2/pause 500/speak Wizard "Here, I have something for you: a lesson in the pervasive energies of the world. Come closer."/pause 500/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 1/speak Wizard "Do you see this symbol, here?"/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Wizard "This is a gate. A portal to another world: a doorway through which an elemental can traverse, or a window through which I can peer."/pause 500/speak Wizard "$q 66 null#Have you ever encountered an elemental#$r 66 0 event_elemental1#Yes!#$r 66 -10 event_elemental2#You mean those blue squishy things in the mine?#$r 66 0 event_elemental3#I don't think so..."/pause 500/speak Wizard "Elementals are a sort of spirit, composed of the most pure building blocks of our universe.#$b#They are rarely seen by the common human; they show themselves only to the truly special. Some, like myself, are fortunate enough to seek and find them, eventually forming a bond of sorts."/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/speak Wizard "Those spirits that you have encountered in the town are not elementals - they are something more derivative and simplistic, though still intriguing. Nevertheless, I believe it is safe to say they have taken an interest in your fate. And whenever a spirit takes interest, so must we all."/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Perhaps someday you will attract greater attention. Until then, serve the world, @. #$b# Be at peace.$1 "/pause 800/end dialogueWarpOut Wizard "I do hope what I have said doesn't get to your head.#$b#Pride easily maneuvers you off the wise path. Maintaining a clear mind is crucial for the path ahead of you, farmer."

Entries.3073002/f Wizard 1000/f Linus 250/t 2000: nightTime/-1000 -1000/farmer 15 8 1 Linus 29 8 2 Wizard 30 9 3/skippable/specificTemporarySprite linusCampfire/viewport 29 7 clamp true/pause 3000/speak Wizard "The river rages with possibilities."/pause 300/speak Linus "More than usual?"/pause 300/speak Wizard "Indeed. It is a tangled tapestry we weave. To follow a single thread... impossible."/pause 300/speak Linus "Especially when someone is playing with the strings, hum? "/pause 300/speak Wizard "Ah. So you have noticed, as well. I might have guessed.$3"/pause 300/speak Linus "Hard not to notice."/pause 300/speak Wizard "Indeed."/pause 200/speak Wizard "And it seems the fates, too, take notice on this day.#$b#Come closer, @. There is no need for you to hide amongst the bushes."/speed farmer 2/move farmer 11 0 1/faceDirection Linus 3/emote Linus 16/pause 500/speak Wizard "We were just speaking of you."/speak Wizard "$q 42 null#... #$r 42 10 event_speakof1#It's rude to talk about people behind their backs.#$r 42 0 event_speakof2#Er... you were...?"/pause 500/move farmer 2 0 2/move farmer 0 1 1/faceDirection Linus 2/pause 500/speak Wizard "It seems that I am not the only one who has noticed the way the energies swirl about you.#$b#Though he may not be a master of elementals, Linus is perspicacious enough to sense the truth without divining, unlike most mundane folk in this valley. "/pause 500/speak Wizard "$q 79 null#You hold fate in your hands, @. What will you do with it?#$r 79 50 event_fate1#Restore the natural order of the world.#$r 79 0 event_fate2#What...? I don't want to do anything with it!#$r 79 -50 event_fate3#Extort it for my own gain."/pause 500/speak Wizard "Soon the tides will turn and, if you are not vigilant, the delicate balance may fall. Be prepared.#$b#Until then, seek the energies, @. We will meet again. "/pause 100/end dialogueWarpOut Wizard "Linus is a good friend of mine.#$b#Have you two spoken? He has a very unique perspective on the world.$3"

Entries.3073009/f Wizard 3500/O Wizard/e 3073008: none/14 18/farmer 10 29 0 Wizard 11 16 0/skippable/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Do you dream, @?"/move farmer 0 -13 0/quickQuestion #Sometimes, I think. But I never remember them.#Just about farm stuff. Sheep and sprinklers.#Sure. I dream of adventures and epic quests!(break)pause 100\speak Wizard "I see... such is not uncommon.$1"(break)pause 100\emote Wizard 32\pause 500\speak Wizard "For some reason it amuses me to imagine you having such mundane dreams.$1"(break)pause 100\speak Wizard "Ah... the dreams of my younger days.$1"/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Some days I open my eyes to dawn and wonder if I have not woken at all. Such sights as I wake to can only be a dream. And yet...$0"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak Wizard "More and more often of a night I find myself lying awake.$0#$b#Not, as I used to do, because sleep refuses to take me, but because I find my waking world too enthralling to give up, even for a few hours.$1#$b#Nothing I have done in my life makes me deserving of this. This life and love we share. It’s more than I ever dreamed.$9#$b#Happiness has always been a fickle and fleeting beast. How could it ever be more?"/quickQuestion #You’re right. It never lasts. ‘This too shall pass.’#Happiness is what we make it. We’re all as happy as we let ourselves be.#...(break)pause 100\speak Wizard "That is what I used to believe..."(break)pause 100\speak Wizard "I had never believed such a thing before... and yet, you may be right."(break)pause 100/pause 1000/playMusic spaceMusic/speak Wizard "I brought you up here to show you this.$1"/faceDirection Wizard 0/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/move Wizard 2 0 1/move Wizard 0 -3 0/move Wizard -2 0 0/move farmer -1 0 3/move farmer 0 -3 0/move farmer 1 0 0/viewport move 0 -2 4000/speak Wizard "You can see the entire valley from here. When I came to this town, it was with the intention of living out the remainder of my days in quiet solitude. For a time it seemed I would succeed. No one pays much mind to the eccentric living in the tower on the outskirts of an obscure village."/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak Wizard "Then I met you.$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Wizard "And you allowed me to wonder again. Thoughts I hadn’t thought for a hundred years drifted through my mind. And I thought:#$b#'perhaps it would not be so bad to share some of what I once was. Not all history is meant to be forgotten.'"/pause 1000/speak Wizard "The rest you know, of course.#$b#You summarily dispatched all of my expectations.#$b#You tore down my walls and planted seeds where they had stood.#$b#You patched pieces of me I had never expected to heal...#$b#and others that I hadn’t known were broken in the first place.$2"/pause 1000/speak Wizard "You saved me, @. I hope you know that.$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 20/pause 1000/speak Wizard "When first we met I told you we had many adventures ahead, you and I.$1#$b#The future is strange like that. It takes what you think you understand and twists it around on you. I never knew the half of it.$1#$b#If I had, I probably would have fled.$9"/pause 1000/speak Wizard "I don’t know what the future holds for us. And for once I would rather not.$1#$b#Let it be an adventure.$7#$b#Let it be the beginning of a tale and not the end I once expected to find.$7"/pause 1000/speak Wizard "And when at long last it comes to a close, let there be fireworks in place of a slow fade to black.$1"/pause 500/animate Wizard true true 100 28/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 20/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 20/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 20/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 20/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 20/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 20/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 20/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 20/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 20/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 20/faceDirection farmer 1 true/animate farmer false true 100 101/pause 2000/viewport move 0 -2 6000/pause 5000/speak Wizard "...and into eternity.$6"/end dialogueWarpOut Wizard "Did you enjoy yourself tonight, @, love of my life?$1#$b#It is getting late. I already took care of all left over chores, so come, lets lay in bed together.$6#$b#I may or may not have more to tell you still.$4"

Entries.3073009/f Wizard 3500/O Wizard/e 3073008: none/14 18/farmer 10 29 0 Wizard 11 16 0/skippable/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Do you dream, @?"/move farmer 0 -13 0/quickQuestion #Sometimes, I think. But I never remember them.#Just about farm stuff. Sheep and sprinklers.#Sure. I dream of adventures and epic quests!(break)pause 100\speak Wizard "I see... such is not uncommon.$1"(break)pause 100\emote Wizard 32\pause 500\speak Wizard "For some reason it amuses me to imagine you having such mundane dreams.$1"(break)pause 100\speak Wizard "Ah... the dreams of my younger days.$1"/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Some days I open my eyes to dawn and wonder if I have not woken at all. Such sights as I wake to can only be a dream. And yet...$0"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak Wizard "More and more often of a night I find myself lying awake.$0#$b#Not, as I used to do, because sleep refuses to take me, but because I find my waking world too enthralling to give up, even for a few hours.$1#$b#Nothing I have done in my life makes me deserving of this. This life and love we share. It’s more than I ever dreamed.$9#$b#Happiness has always been a fickle and fleeting beast. How could it ever be more?"/quickQuestion #You’re right. It never lasts. ‘This too shall pass.’#Happiness is what we make it. We’re all as happy as we let ourselves be.#...(break)pause 100\speak Wizard "That is what I used to believe..."(break)pause 100\speak Wizard "I had never believed such a thing before... and yet, you may be right."(break)pause 100/pause 1000/playMusic spaceMusic/speak Wizard "I brought you up here to show you this.$1"/faceDirection Wizard 0/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/move Wizard 2 0 1/move Wizard 0 -3 0/move Wizard -2 0 0/move farmer -1 0 3/move farmer 0 -3 0/move farmer 1 0 0/viewport move 0 -2 4000/speak Wizard "You can see the entire valley from here. When I came to this town, it was with the intention of living out the remainder of my days in quiet solitude. For a time it seemed I would succeed. No one pays much mind to the eccentric living in the tower on the outskirts of an obscure village."/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak Wizard "Then I met you.$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Wizard "And you allowed me to wonder again. Thoughts I hadn’t thought for a hundred years drifted through my mind. And I thought:#$b#'perhaps it would not be so bad to share some of what I once was. Not all history is meant to be forgotten.'"/pause 1000/speak Wizard "The rest you know, of course.#$b#You summarily dispatched all of my expectations.#$b#You tore down my walls and planted seeds where they had stood.#$b#You patched pieces of me I had never expected to heal...#$b#and others that I hadn’t known were broken in the first place.$2"/pause 1000/speak Wizard "You saved me, @. I hope you know that.$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 20/pause 1000/speak Wizard "When first we met I told you we had many adventures ahead, you and I.$1#$b#The future is strange like that. It takes what you think you understand and twists it around on you. I never knew the half of it.$1#$b#If I had, I probably would have fled.$9"/pause 1000/speak Wizard "I don’t know what the future holds for us. And for once I would rather not.$1#$b#Let it be an adventure.$7#$b#Let it be the beginning of a tale and not the end I once expected to find.$7"/pause 1000/speak Wizard "And when at long last it comes to a close, let there be fireworks in place of a slow fade to black.$1"/pause 500/animate Wizard true true 100 28/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 20/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 20/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 20/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 20/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 20/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 20/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 20/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 20/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 20/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 20/faceDirection farmer 1 true/animate farmer false true 100 101/pause 2000/viewport move 0 -2 6000/pause 5000/speak Wizard "...and into eternity.$6"/end dialogueWarpOut Wizard "Did you enjoy yourself tonight, @, love of my life?$1#$b#It is getting late. I already took care of all left over chores, so come, lets lay in bed together.$6#$b#I may or may not have more to tell you still.$4"
